82b8(mdo): la so// / rtag tu ma chad ma dgas su skye ba ga// nang dang 'bru'i mdod dmas 'byor gyu sa stan dang grags dang gzugs dang 'dag gas// bska sa bdu yang legs par sa
83a1(mdo): shog/ bud med thams cad rtag tu bor gyur te// dpa' zhing rdul yod mkhas shing kasal gang zhog/ de kun rtag tu byang chub bying spyod gyur ra/ pha rol byin pa drug la spyod par shon/ 
83a2(mdo): phyogs bcu dag na rin chen shing dbang drung // sangs rgyas bder gshegs rin chen byed du rgyal// khri la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur da cing // chos bstan pa yang de dag zos par shog/ bdag gis sdig pa'i
83a3(mdo): las rnams bsgrub pa ni// srid pa nyam rab som chad gang bskyabs pa// sdig las kang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob pa// de dag thams cad ma lus 'ad gyur da cig/ sems can gang dag srid bar bcing
83a4(mdo): gnas kun// 'khor ba'i shags pa'i zag pa'i sa dam bcings pa// shes rab lag gis bcings pa dkrol bar shog// sUka/ da sA la rnams las thard gyur nga thub gyur da cig/ sems can kang / 
83a5(mdo): dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dang // gang dag 'jig rten khams ni gzhon rnams na/ bsod nams zab mo sna tshogs rnams byed pa// ded kun la rjes su yid rang ngo // lus dpangag dang yid kyis bsgrubs pa/ 
83a6(mdo): bdag gi rjes su yid rang bsod nams des bdag gi sngon grub 'bras bu yod par shog/ byang chub rdul bral bu med thob kyu nga cig/ gang dag tog dang dri sa bral ba dang // dri med yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang / 
83a7(mdo): yongs su bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yis ni// bska lad pa drug bcur ngan song spong bar 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gyis// skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rigs las// thal sbyar 'dug te rgyal ba

83b1(mdo): de 'drar 'gyur ro// gang dag ma pa'i bu gar gshegs pa 'di ni grags gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gan nas dge' ba byas ma yin// gnyis la ma yin gzhi la ma yon la byin bcu la byin// de ltam
83b2(mdo): sangs rgyas stong gi gamanas dge' ba byas pa yin// / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ gshegs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bzhi pa'o//

83b4(mdo): de A bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa// pad ma'i 'byung gnas 'dis/ 'das pa dang // ma 'ongs pa dang / da lA byung ba'i sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par stod do// 
83b5(mdo): rgyal ba'i gang dag sngar gyur da gang byung dang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag nag pe 'tsho ba// rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag brgya'o// rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod// thub dbang gi zhing la
83b6(mdo): zhi rnam par dag/ sku ni gser gyi mdog du rab tu gad la// dbyangs rnams kun gyis sangs rgyas gsung snyan de// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa'i gsungs / bung ba ma bya ud pa la sngon
83b7(mdo): dbu'// mthon zing lcang lo bya ni tsa sha 'dra// khwa dung ltar rab tu kar pa'i tshe bas// rtag tu gser ltar rnam par mdzes par gda'// spyan ni rang bzhin 'thon 'thing dri ma myed/ ud pa la sngon
83b8(mdo): po rab tu rgyas pa 'dral// ljags ni ring bzhin mdzes pa pad ma'i mdog/ pad ma 'drar gnas pad ma'i ze la 'dral// zhal gyis mdzod spu pad rtsa dung dang ni/ bye du r+ya'i mdog 'ang g.yas su
84a1(mdo): 'khyim// nub pa'i zla ba phra zhing zla ba zad pa 'dras/ sku'i lta ba bung pa gsal ba bzhin// zhal yas mthor ba'i shangs ni rtag tu lhag ge ste// 'jam zhi bas ya'i
84a2(mdo): gser ltar kha dog bzang // rtag par rgya nad tu rgyal ba thams thams cad kyi// ro mchog 'am zhing dam pa mchog rab 'phags/ ba s+phu'i pu ga nas ni re re skyes// spu rnams skyes pa ga.a sa su 'khyin
84a3(mdo): ba ste/ mthom 'thing 'dra bar 'tsher zhing lcang lo can// ma bya'i 'drin sdug 'bri bar sngol ladzes // bltas ma thag tu sku'is sbab bar bgyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten de dag ni thams cad gang / 
84a4(mdo): 'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal maHyas zhi// bde ba kun gyi sa sems can rnams kyang tshim// sems can 'gro dang dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dang // yid dgas lha rnams mi 'gro rnams su
84a5(mdo): sems can de dag thams cad bde bas tshom// ngan 'gror 'gro pa rnams ni thams cad zhi// kha dog mdog bzang gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od// maco'i 'i gser ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku// bder
84a6(mdo): gshegs zla ba rab tu byed/ shal 'dzum zhing nam mdzes shind tu dri myed zhal// gzhon nu bcas 'dras sku lus yam lag 'jam// seng ge 'dra bar rtsal gyis gnon pa'i mchog/ phyag ring phyug na
84a7(mdo): rab tu ring ba ste// sa la'i lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// mdom gang 'od 'bar 'od zer rab tu gtong nyi ma stong ltar rab tu lhag ke'o// nub pa'i dbang po'i sku mchog dri ya myed/ 
84a8(mdo): zhing rnams mtha' yas thams cad rab tu snang // sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par lta ri bas// zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnams su yad mtshon byed zla ba nyi ma mang po dag/ de dag thams
84b1(mdo): 'od ni myed pa gyus// sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gon sa ste/ sangs rgyas brgyal zag nyi ma song rnam pan// grong rnams mnal las stong phrag brgya dgan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma / 
84b2(mdo): can mthong // bsod nams stong zag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku// yos tan kun gyis rab tu brgya dang pa'i su// srang ces dbang po la sna 'dra rgyal ba'i phyag/ phyag dang zhabs 'od rab langs/ 
84b3(mdo): dri ma byed// sa'i steng gi rdul dang mtshungs 'dra snyed// phra ba'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas gapa 'das dang // ka pa dag phra ba'i rdul snyed byung ba dang // gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed bzhugs pa
84b4(mdo): dang / rgyal ba de dag la ni rab dang ba'i// ngag yid/ lus kyis me tog dbul ba dang // spos rnams dbul dang sngags pa brgya dka dang // dgel ba'i sems kyis kyang ni
84b5(mdo): phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag dge' rgyur de pa/ snying po mchog rab sna chog du ma ste// bdag gis bskal pa stong du lce brgya yis// sangs rgyas yon tu brjod
84b6(mdo): par mi nus so// rgyal ba gcig gi yon tan rnams kyang ni// lde stod kyis kyang cung zad brjod kyi nus// bdag gis rgyal ba dag ni thams cas kyi somanyan cig brgyas brjod par mi nus so// 
84b7(mdo): ltar bcas 'jig rten thams cad mtshor gyurd te// srid pa'i rtse mo thams can chus gang ba// skra'i rtse mos// par nus srid kyi bder gshegs rnams kyi yon tan gcig la phyin/ 
84b8(mdo): yus dang ngaka yid rab tu dpapa yis// rgyal ba'i kun la bdag gis sngags bstod pas// bdag gis bsod nams 'bras bu mchog pas kas kang // des ni sems can rgyal reg gyurd cig/ 
85a1(mdo): de ltar rgyam thos sas rgyas rnams bstogs// rgyam po 'di la smon las 'dedabs pa ni// sa 'ongs gnas pa lasas rnams su yang // gang da gang tu bdag ni skye ban
85a2(mdo): mi lam du ni 'di 'dra'i nga lta zhing // der ni bshags pa'i 'di 'dras nyan par 'gyil// rgyal stod pad ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba// skye bre pa der ni rnyed par bkyi'o// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs
85a3(mdo): myed dang // gang yang bskal pa stong du rnyed rka ba// de dag mi la du'ang mnyan par bgyil// nyon 'gyur de che yang de dag bshad par bgyi'o// sems can sdug bsngal mtshol las mang par bgyil// pha ro lad
85a4(mdo): phyind pa drug pa rdzogs par bgyil// phyi nas bla med byang \u0f7frab thob par bgyil// bdag gi zhing ni lhod pa med rgyu dad cig/ rdza brdungs rnam par smind pa'i 'bras bu dang // rgyal ba thams cad la
85a5(mdo): bstod pa'i rgyus// shag kya thub dbang mngon du blta bar bgyi 'a der ni bdag gis lung bstan na thob gyur da tsog// gser gyi lag pa'i dbang dpa gser gi 'od// bdag gi khye'u ni gang yin 'di
85a6(mdo): sis kyang // der ni bu mo de dag gnyi ka dang // byang chub bla byed lung bstan thob par nog/ sems can gang dag gan yod rten byed cing // skyabs dang thal nas phongs par gyur ba dag/ de dag la 'das la
85a7(mdo): dus rnams na// smyo ba dang dpung gnyen skyabs dang rtend mya da cig/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'dra bar byed gyur da cig// bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas rgyang dad bang shog// sngon mthal 'das pa de dag ji srid pa/ 
85a8(mdo): ma 'ongs paska lang par byang chub spyad par bgyi// gsem 'od dam pa'i ni bshags pa'i sa bdag gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho snyam pa dgog/ bdag gi las kyi rgyalatsho 'dabyar da ni// bdag gi nyon mongs rgya tsho chang/ 
85b1(mdo): par shog/ bdag gi bsod nams rgya mtsho rdzogs kyu rad cig/ ye shes dri myed sdang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi ye shes rgya mtsho rnam dag shog/ yon tan kun gyi rgya mtshor gyur da par shog/ byang chub yon
85b2(mdo): tan yon tan rin chen rdzogs// gser 'od dam pa'i bshags pa'i stobs kyis ni// bdag gi bsod nams rab tu sdang bar shog/ bdag kyi byang rgyab snang ba nas dag chung nga// ye shes dri med snang ban
85b3(mdo): bdag gi lus kyi 'od ni snang bar shog/ bsod nas snang ba lang reng bya ba'i phyir// 'jig rten gsum na khyad par 'phags kyu rad cig/ bsod nams stobs dang rab tu ldan par shog/ sdug bsngal
85b4(mdo): rgya mtsho las ni sgrol ba dang / bde ba kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i nas ma 'ongs pa'i lang par byang chub srud par bgyi// 'jig rten sngon mthar ji snyed gshegs pa'i// de dag zhing ni rgyal
85b5(mdo): thams cad kyi// yon tan mtha' yas khyad 'phags ci 'a// yon tan mtha' sas rnams kyis bdag gi zhing // ma 'ongs dus na de 'drar 'gyur bar shog// gser 'od dam pa'i
85b6(mdo): do' sgo'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// de bzhin gshegs pa mas cad la bstod pa/ me tog pad ma'i 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i le'us ba'o// denas thas
85b7(mdo): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dka gsungs so// bsam gyis mi khyab mdo' rnams gzhan dag tu// stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad te// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// song pa
85b8(mdo): chos rnams mdo nam/ bshad pa yin// sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas// chos rnams thams cad shes par mi nus te// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/ stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam pogad
86a1(mdo): pa yin sems can kun gyis minas shes 'byung dang // sems can 'byung bya myong ni snying rje'i dbang // thakhas dang tshul dang rgya gzhan rnams kyis ni// mdo mchog dam la yi dbang po 'dun
86a2(mdo): do// lus lan grong khyer khyim stong ji bzhin te// dbang po nas ni dmag dang chom rkun 'dra// de dag thams cad krong cig gnas mod kyi// de dag phan tshun rnam par mi shes so// mig gi dbang po gzugs kyurang
86a3(mdo): nams la rgyug/ na pa'i dbang po sbrul la rnam/ bar dpyod sna'i dbang po sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog/ sde'i dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyug/ lus kyi dbang po rig pa dag la rgyud// yid
86a4(mdo): kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam par dpyod// dbang po drug po 'di dag daphan tshun du// rang rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed/ sems ni sgyu ma lta bu g.yo ba yin// dbang po drug ni yul la
86a5(mdo): nam dpyod de// ji ltar mi zhig stong 'gros rgyug pa dang // dmag dang chom dkun dag dang gnas gnas pa bzhin/ ji ltar sa mas ni yul drug gnas bcas shing // dbang po'i dpyod yul
86a6(mdo): dag kyang rab shes pa// de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te// dbang po'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab tu shes// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang // ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos
86a7(mdo): drug po thams cad la// dbang pod zhugs pa'i bya bzhin g.yo bar gyud // dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po do ni zhes bdag nyid byed// lus ni g.yo ba myed cing byed paskyed
86a8(mdo): snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin/ yang dag ma yin yongs su tog las byung // grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas// sa dang me dang chu dang / rlung rnams ni// klong gzhan gnas te phyogs
86b1(mdo): dang phyogs gnas pa// dper na yul gdug gnas cig ji bzhin te// rtag tu ba tshun mthun pa ma yin bzhin// khams kyi sul rams bzhi po de dag kyang // gnyis ni ca gnyis ni zur
86b2(mdo): 'gro// phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te/ khams sprul de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// sa'i sbrul dang chu'i sul dag dang // 'di gnyis 'og du zad par 'gyur smin/ 
86b3(mdo): me'i sprul dang rlung kyi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis ster gyi nam mkhas 'gro ba yin// ji ltar sngon cad byas pa'i las rnam kyis/ sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dong // y+YA dang mi dang ngan song gsum
86b4(mdo): dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i las kyi sred par skye// bad kan dru pa/ 'khrigs pa 'ang rgyu nga na// lus shig cin dang ngan skyugs rnam/ sa kyis gang // mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur
86b5(mdo): dur khrod dag na 'thodad pa shing bzhind gyur // lha mo khyod ni chos rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can de bzhin gang zag dang / chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa'i rkyen las
86b6(mdo): byab ba la yin// 'byung ba chen po 'di dag tshe 'byung byid// ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste// gang gi phyir na 'byung ba myi 'byung ba// de phyir 'byung ba che zhes pas brjod do// ma rig pas ni
86b7(mdo): dAn yang yod min la/ ma rig pa'i rkyend las byung ba yim// ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te// de bas pas ni ma rig tu shad do/ 'du byed rnam shes mying dang gzugs bcas dang // skye mchen
86b8(mdo): drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang // sred dang lend dang de bzhin srid pa dang // skye dngag shi mye ngan gnod pa spangs/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam kris mi khyab pa'i// ma tshal lo ji ltar gnas par/ 
87a1(mdo): sa byung bya las byung bya dang mi 'byung dang // tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis nam dpyad dang / bdag lta bar gyu dad pa gcad pang gis// ye shes ral gyis nyon mongs rgyamo// 
87a2(mdo): nas ma skyong par gyur par ltos// byang chub yon tan rgya ches dag par gis// ngas ni/ bdud rtsi'o grong khyer sgo yang phye la// bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstand// 8
87a3(mdo): ngo khyor kunas der 'dug/ pa ni bdud rtsi'i khu bas bdag tshim byangs ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang bus// ras ni chos kyi sngon ma
87a4(mdo): che gro 'bab byas bu / ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phab/ ra ni nyon mongs dgral bcom pa rnams las rgyal// ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgrem// srid pa mi mtsho las sems
87a5(mdo): robyA N+ye ba sngal blos rje dras ni pA sod gsum gyi lam rnams pakag/ sems can nyon mongs me'i sa gdungs kyu rang pa/ rten med gyurd cing dpung gnyen med pa dag/ srog chags nyon
87a6(mdo): skyos kyis gdungs kyi byas nas// bdud rtsi mi nu ba lasal ba'is tsas par byas// gang srim skal pa du ya sngos cad ngas/ 'dren pa bsam kyis mi khyab mche pa byas// chos kyi sku de yongs su
87a7(mdo): ngos pan// ut+pal thugs partand las byung rgyab phyir spyad de// lag pa dang ni mag dpa sam pa dang // yan lag mchog dang bu sug bu mo dang // nor dbyig / nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gisapa/ 
87a8(mdo): khyed du rgya dpa ri tshe myi tshogs pang // stong gsum sring dzin mams can dang / sa dang / dums du da dang // rnam sa tshal dag dmas pas// 'azungs thathams cad pa dag
87b1(mdo): te// de dag thams cad phyar klags nas/ rab tu 'phra ba'i rtul 'drar byas// nam mkhru'i dkyil 'khor ci tsam par// bye ma'i phung po spungs nas ni// 'di la cha gsum dpe bar nus / sa la
87b2(mdo): rdul ni srod byon mas/ stong gsum dag ni thams cad ni// rdul rnams pas rgyas kyi khya ba la/ sems can kun gyi shes pa gang // de ni sems can gcig gir gyur da// shes pa de yis brtul nas kyi
87b3(mdo): phyi ma kho krab pa byed na na/ sem su can kun las rapo/ 'phags pa e shes rab ldan yi rnams kyis// thams cad bzang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i mkhyen nus so// nub pa chen po'i ye shes gang / 
87b4(mdo): skad cig gtsug la 'jug mo yA / bskal pa bye ba du mar ni/ gang du 'ang 'grod par mi nus so// / ga semathod dmal mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid
87b5(mdo): le 'u zhes kyi sbyin drug bya'o// / de nas rgyal po chen po rnams thos kyi bu dang rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang // rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po pa dang / 
87b6(mdo): kyil gyi chen po dmyag yi khu zang stan lus langs te/ blo gos 'phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus me g.yas pa li lA nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar pa btud nas
87b7(mdo): bcocom ldan 'das kha 'di skad ces gso lad to// btsun pa bco ldan 'das kaser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ na bzhin de bzhin
87b8(mdo): gshegs pa khrims cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin gzhogs pa thesdus nad kyis dgongs pabyang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis
88a1(mdo): ba/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa ga tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags te/ brjod nas rab tu bkun/ 
88a2(mdo): ka D+ha pra/ lha'i khong khyim thams cad skang por bgyid pa sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba tu sbyin par byed pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro 'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje 'i 'jig rten gyi
88a3(mdo): sdug bsngal thams cad snyoms pa/ 'jigs kho khams cad kyi rgyan gcod pa pha rold kyi dpa ka tshogs thams cad rab tu bzlog pa/ mug ke yi dkon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi dgon pa
88a4(mdo): sems cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ ga la thams cad se khyad pa mchog tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mya ngan dang nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi par bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa
88a5(mdo): gnod brgya stong rab tu 'joms par po byed pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad na/ chos mnya
88a6(mdo): pa bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang bsas pa bzhi 'i lus 'di gzhi chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gi lus la bcod pa dang / stobs dang mthu yang bskyed
88a7(mdo): ba 'gyur / 'i brjid dang / pas dang sun sum tshogs pa yang bdag sagagasus la 'jug par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag nyam pa chen po can nims dang ldan pa jam sA pa/ 
88a8(mdo): chos kyi rgyal po lags te btsus pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyis su da kyu dang gnod sbyin dang / yu ma yin dang / nam mkha' zhing dang / dri la dang / mi 'am mi dang/ lto 'phye chen
88b1(mdo): po nams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o// 'byung po'i tshogs mi bzad pa/ snying rje ma mchis pa/ gzhan gyi mdangs 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ 
88b2(mdo): dang nga / gnod sprin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / lhan cig tu rtag par rgyu nad tu yA'i dmyig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas 'dzam bu'i glang thams cad la blta bar bgyi
88b3(mdo): bskum pamamar bgyi yongs su bskyar bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du// bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten spyod pa zhes ming du chags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang su dag
88b4(mdo): 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir pha rold kyi dmig tshogs kyis g.yul 'jom dpar 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i dgon pa 'am/ nad kyi dgon pa 'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong dang / gnod pa
88b5(mdo): brgya phrag steng dag gis shes par 'gyur ldan du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis gser 'od dam pa 'do 'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge' slong chos spun+de dag la bskus
88b6(mdo): bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nas bdag cakra rgyal po bzhis rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyis dgel slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul pa na / yul gang gang dang kar du mchi bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po
88b7(mdo): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dpe de dag du rgya cher yang dag par stond par 'gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa sna tshogs stong yul ru 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dgarab zhi par 'gyur ro/ 
88b8(mdo): btsum ba bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyal po gang gi yul du mde sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa'i dge' slong chos smra ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde la dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang bsnyen par 'gyu
89a1(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mya'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te zos nas/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzind pa'i dka' slong de dag phyir
89a2(mdo): grol ba de dag thams lngas kun tu srung bar brgyad/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su 'di nad pa dang / yongs su skyong bar bgyid na// btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po
89a3(mdo): chen po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can nams kun tu bsrung bar bgyi yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang // yongs su bskyang pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su byung bar bgyi'o// 
89a4(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pos nam dge' slong dum dgel slong ma 'bru dkyil bsnyen ma mdo ste yi dbang po 'dzind pa la bde bar spyad bya thams cad kyis bde bar bgyid na btsun pa bcom ldan
89a5(mdo): 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis I'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems cad rnams la bde ba'iyo byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang / yo byad thams cad kyis phun sum
89a6(mdo): 'tshogs par brgya mo// btsun bcom ldan 'das namo ze rgyal po waM/ dge' slo ngas dge' slong sa 'am/ dge' snyen nas/ dgel bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzind pa la sti snang bgyid bla mar btsun
89a7(mdo): ri mo bgyid cing mdzod na btsun gyi bcom ldan 'das bdug drug rgyal rgya chen po bzhi'is/ mi rgyal po de la rgyal po thams cad pas de la ches bsti stang brgyal/ ches bla mar bgyi/ ches rim grong brgya ches
89a8(mdo): da pa 'ibyin sus mas can tu spa ma byamags pad+ma 'gyi'o// denas paca gas das kyi rgyam pa chen pa ban la legs pa shes bya ba byin te/ sa dag legs so legs pa
89b1(mdo): po chen po khyed kyang legs so/ lags so'adi lta ste/ khyed ni sngon ga rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dka' ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen
89b2(mdo): bkur byas pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos sgo ban rgyas kyi rgyal po rgya chos kyis lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal po byed pa'o// 'di lta ste khyed ni yun ring po po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan
89b3(mdo): ma bde' ma dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa' la zhugs pa/ mi phan pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sems can thams cad la
89b4(mdo): de ba thams cad nyo bar bsgrub pa de brtson pa yin te po chen po khyed bzhi'i sa mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang / ris 'gro'abyed/ 
89b5(mdo): bapo pa das kun tu srung bar gyis 'on/ mi su bskyab pa dang / yongs su 'byung ba dang / yong su bsrung ba dang / ni ba dang pa ri legs su kyang bgyis du
89b6(mdo): dezhen rgyal po chen sa dpung g.yog dang gan sbyin bgyi stong thug du sa dang bcas pa byed bzhis/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / cod lalta byung ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul
89b7(mdo): kun tu srung bar 'byung / yongs su basbyangs pa dang / du yongs su bzung par yang 'gyur ro// des na rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhi
89b8(mdo): lha dang lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo' sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rold kyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar
90a1(mdo): byed pa/ 'di'i phyir dge' ngam pa/ dgel slong ma 'am/ dge' bsnyen ma 'am mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa de dag la kun tu bsrub ba gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang
90a2(mdo): g.yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskya pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po nam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po
90a3(mdo): 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po myig myi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lta ba sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
90a4(mdo): su thal mo spyadad pa btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pa 'di skad ces gso dald d+ho// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus nag gas
90a5(mdo): 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ang grong ngam/ grong re ram/ grong brdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor tapho brang 'khor gang tu spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal po gang
90a6(mdo): dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsum pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por gyur da pa gapal la zhig/ lha'i dbang po la dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan pochos 'dis// rgyal po brgyad cing rtag par rgyun
90a7(mdo): tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam/ ris 'gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa brgyad dam/ dge' slong ngam/ dge' slong ma 'am/ dge la bsnyen nam/ dge la snyen ma mdo sde
90a8(mdo): 'idabang po 'dzind pa de dag la yang sti stang bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ rim 'gro ba bgyid cing mchod de/ rtag par gyur tu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po 'argyal mo nyan na/ chos nyan pa'i chu sa
90b1(mdo): chu chos kyi bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma yis lha'i lus 'di dag gzi chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ bdag
90b2(mdo): cag pa brtson 'grus dang / mthul dang stobs chen por sang bgyid pa lags so// bdag cag kyi gzil brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum 'tshogs pa rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa
90b3(mdo): ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa gnod sbyin pargya stong thag du ma dang / lus ltar mi gda' bar bgyis ste/ da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus ma/ grong ngas/ grong khyer
90b4(mdo): ram grong rdal la/ yul 'khor ram/ pho phrang 'khor ga dan gser 'od dam pa mdo sde li dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyu der pa de dag tu mchi'o// mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde
90b5(mdo): 'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa' dang / rib 'gro bgyid pa dang mchod pa bgyid pa de mchod pa can dag kun la bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yos
90b6(mdo): su bskyang ba dang / chad pa sang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar brgyam
90b7(mdo): yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba/ chad pa spangs pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs 'asu 'gyur bar bgyi'o// yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / a la da da/ 
90b8(mdo): gnod pa dang 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyi'o// pha rold kyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang slar rlog par bgyi'o// mo'i rgyal po kapa la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
91a1(mdo): 'di nyan pa dang / rim 'gro bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa de'i dmamra 'ad nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
91a2(mdo): nam dgra' zla 'da' nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul der dam par bzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'ad
91a3(mdo): de'i tshe de'i dus na gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di lig zi brjid kyi mthus/ dgra bla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po nga rgyal po gzhan dag dang / g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang kyi yul du phyin na yang yum
91a4(mdo): 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa pa yang 'byung bar 'byung / yul du gza' dang nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur / yul du brel pa sna tshog brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
91a5(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nas dga' zla 'dab nye ba ba'i rgyal po de rang gi yul du phyin na gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / brel bsna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
91a6(mdo): dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi'i dpag bsogs te/ pha ro lad kyi dmag tshogs su mchi ba'i slad du/ rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / yun cig tu yul
91a7(mdo): der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig par 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang
91a8(mdo): g.yog tu bcas pa gnod sbyin pa rgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis ste/ deng ma chi bar bgyi'o// pha ro lad kyi dmag tshogs de shul du bzhugs pa las kyang de nyid nas bzlog par bgyi'o// 
91b1(mdo): brel pa sna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// bgyegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de mchi bar yang mi nus na/ yul gshig par bgyid pa lta ga la
91b2(mdo): 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag leg mo legs so// rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs te/ khyed pa sa yang
91b3(mdo): ba grangs myed par byed pa khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir mya'i rgyal ga ser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / ram
91b4(mdo): 'gro byed pa dang / mchod pa de dag la kun tu bsrung ba gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung pa dang / yongs su bskyar ba dang / yangs su kha zung bachad pa spangs pa dang / zhi
91b5(mdo): pa dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ rgyal po'i lo nga 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig/ yongs su bskyab
91b6(mdo): ba dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang chad pa spangs pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa ma
91b7(mdo): cad las yongs su zad par gyis shig/ pha ro mod kyi pag chogs rnams kyang klog shig / 'dam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po dag kyi 'thab pa dang / 'chang gyi 'phrul ba dang / kyi
91b8(mdo): cod pa dang / rtsi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyale po chen po dpung dpag yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri ba na
92a1(mdo): stong de dag rang rang kyi yul mngon pas dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dka' ba dang / rang gyi nor gyi phub bos phan tshun rnam par myi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun rnam para'
92a2(mdo): ba myi skyed pa dang / rang kyis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal po yob pa'i rang kyi rgyal srid kyi dgra phyag gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol kyi
92a3(mdo): gnon pa dang / nas 'dzas bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri ba'i stong dag na rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun du byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ phar
92a4(mdo): tshun du yi 'thab 'chang gyi drul myi brtsod phyi 'gyed par rang rang kyi yul/ dkan dga' bar 'gyur na de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang gso/ ka tu bcas pa khyed bzhi'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'ad rgyas par 'gyur
92a5(mdo): lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang po dang / kyis grang bar 'gyur/ sa yang mdangs can du 'gyur/ dus dang zla ba dang / zla byed dang / lo khyud kor thams
92a6(mdo): cad kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ ka'a' dang rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang nyi ma dang ya ba nyin mtshan du legs par rgya bar 'gyur/ cha dad pa'i rgyand kyangs la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 
92a7(mdo): 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang rlor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ lo baspyod che ba dang / sems myed par 'gyur gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dgel ba
92a8(mdo): li las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyurabal cher bad 'gro mtsho ris 'jig rten du skye ba 'gyur / lha'i khang khyi mo rnams kyang lha dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar d+ha pa 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag gang
92b1(mdo): pa la zhig phyi'i rgyal por gyur la/ gser 'od das pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'i rgyal mo nyid nyan par 'gyur te/ rim 'gro byas/ ri mchod pa rgyam/ dge' slong ngam/ dge' slong ma 'am/ dgel bsnyen na
92b2(mdo): dgel bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa la yang sti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang kayog du bcas pa/ gnod sbyin phrag du ma
92b3(mdo): la snying brtse ba'i phyir rtag par rgyand tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na/ chos nyan pa'i chu'i klung chu'i bdud rtsi'i zhu ba 'das/ khyed cag ka ki lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyung ro// 
92b4(mdo): khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi chen podzad rnye dpal dang / pum ma 'chags pa rnam par 'phel lo// khyed kyi brtsom 'grus dang mtshul dang stobs kyang skyed do// khyed kyi ga mirjid dang
92b5(mdo): dpal dang / phun sum 'tshogs pa yang rnam papa 'phel lo// mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la yang
92b6(mdo): mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yengs pa byas par 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong du a la yang
92b7(mdo): yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// des na myi'i rgyal po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu ba
92b8(mdo): ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung pa dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spangs pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro// btsun mo dam pa dang / 
93a1(mdo): rgyu bu rnams dang / btsum mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / rgyal po 'pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung pa chen por byas par 'gyur// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su
93a2(mdo): bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyar ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyung ba byas par 'gyur ro// / rgyal po pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i'i lha thams cad kyang ches gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ 
93a3(mdo): dang / ches stobs dang ldan pa dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrungs par
93a4(mdo): 'gyur/ yongs su bgyings par 'gyur/ gnod pa myed par 'gyur// dgra' myed par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad/ kyis mi rdzi pa dang / gnon pa myed pa dang / 'khrug pa myed par
93a5(mdo): 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po nam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mag
93a6(mdo): gyi bzang dang / de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun po bcom ldan 'das mo'i rgyal po chen po nag la la zhig gas pa 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dang po'i rgyal po/ la sa 'di yang nyan 'tshal pa/ 
93a7(mdo): 'gyur da / bdag nyid la yang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur / btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor go tshogs rnams la yang bsrung ba
93a8(mdo): chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag thams cad la yang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog du khyad par du 'phags pa/ bla na med pa ban tu bar
93b1(mdo): 'gyur// tshe 'di la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyurd/ rgyal po nyid bsas kyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur da/ bsod nams kyi
93b2(mdo): phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin da 'tshal bar gyurd/ bdag gi yul thams cad kyang kun tu su pa 'tshal bar gyur da yongasu spyo 'tshald par gyur da/ rab kyi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / dgral
93b3(mdo): ma mchis pa dang / pha rold dmag tshogs kyis myi rdzi ba dang / nad 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang / 'azhug pa ma mchis par 'gyid 'tshal bar gyur dam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yeng par ma
93b4(mdo): mchis pa'i sems dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / ri mo dang bcas dpas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di si s+t+wa du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo
93b5(mdo): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/ rtsi'i rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par tu 'phags pa mchi bar bgyi'o// der mchis nas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang spos cha ba sna tshogs
93b6(mdo): kyisna ga cag gad ba cing me tog selas sna tshogs bams par bgyi'o// soms pa sna tshogs kyisasag chag btab pa de chos kyi rna mtshan brgyam sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bathams par btsun
93b7(mdo): phyogs der gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dang sna tshogs kyis legs par bcand pa brgya ma/ mya'i rgyal po zhes lus bkru bar bgyi'o// gos ni rab tu gad la ba gos gsar ba mdzes pa na/ 
93b8(mdo): nas/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgya nad par bgyi'o// bdag gi stan rab tu dam pa bting ba bgyi ste/ stan de la mchis nas/ rgyal po'i rgyag bas dregs par mi bgyi'o// deng rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
94a1(mdo): la chags par mi brgya'o// rgyags pa dang rgyal da dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis gse 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par brgya
94a2(mdo): dge'u slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'dugs bskyed par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des de'i mde'i dus na/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i burnangs dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi
94a3(mdo): tshogs la stug pa dang phan pas blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la snyan par sla bar bgyi'o// btsun mo 'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad ya yang tshig snyan par
94a4(mdo): smra bas bco'o// chos nyan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna chod/ sa sbyor du su lang par bgyi'o// dka' bas kyis yi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas bdag tshim par bgyi'o// dga' ba dang / 
94a5(mdo): bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po bde bar bgyi'o// bdag nyin don chen po thob ba bsam par bgyi'o// bdag dga' ba'i chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o// 
94a6(mdo): rab tu dgal ba'i chen po bskyed nas chos smra ba bsu par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po ba'i la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// rgyal po chen po
94a7(mdo): dag de'i tshe de'i dus na myi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar po sar pa mdzes pa bgo bar bya'o// sdud pa dang rgya nad sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgya nad par bya'o// gdugs dkar po yang bzung
94a8(mdo): bar bya'o// rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i bkod pa chen pos kra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la chos smra bal bsu ba'i phyir deng 'gro bar bya'o// 
94b1(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal pos de gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed kyi bskal la bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor la phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba
94b2(mdo): khrag khrig brgya stong thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa ji skyed bor bde snyed du tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba phra'o khrig brgya stong
94b3(mdo): du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba lha'i gzhal myed khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag 'thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi rgyal rigs lha'i rgya che zhing rgya che ba/ brgya stong phrag du ma thob par 'gyur/ skye ba tham
94b4(mdo): cad du dbang phyug chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring ba 'thob pa/ 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan pa/ 'gyur/ tshig bzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par
94b5(mdo): 'gyur/ brjod pa shind tu rgya che bar 'gyur/ bsngags papa'os par 'gyur/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jogs rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba
94b6(mdo): thob par 'gyur/ stobs che par 'gyur/ chen po che chen po'o stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs pazang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang blta na sdug pa dang kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur
94b7(mdo): skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dgel ba'i bzhes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu myed pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yod
94b8(mdo): can gyi yan lon 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong nas/ mi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang dpag tshad stong du yang bsu bar byal/ chos smra ba de la ston pang 'dushes
95a1(mdo): bskyed par bya'o// 'di snyam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgral bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhag kya thub pa de bdag gi pol pho brang 'dir 'jug pa
95a2(mdo): ra / deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgral bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa bdag gyi rgyal po'i pho phrang 'dir bshos pa so yang par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
95a3(mdo): dka' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun pa mnyan par bya'o// deng bdag chos mnyan pa 'dis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
95a4(mdo): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya'o// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyurapa ro// deng bdag kyis 'das pa da
95a5(mdo): ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam kyis mi khyab pa yang sa shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis sems can dkya
95a6(mdo): ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shi nad tu rgyun bcad par 'gyur ro// der bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya
95a7(mdo): stong du ma 'thob pa dag gis dgel ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis brgya phyim nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge' ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed
95a8(mdo): par 'gyur ro/ deng bdag gis 'khor los bsgrung pa'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge' ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o// deng bskalang pa bye ba khrag
95b1(mdo): khrig brgya stong phrag du mang 'khor pa las yongs su thard par 'gyur ro// der bdag kyis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu myed pa bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam kyis mi khyab pa yongasu bzung
95b2(mdo): par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'di zhi pa dang bde legs su 'gyur
95b3(mdo): pra byasas kyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na myed pa byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis yul 'di thams cad kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur// yongs su bskyangs pa dang / gnod pa
95b4(mdo): byed pa dang / dgra' med pa dang / pha ro yid kyi dam dag tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nang 'gro bgyed pa dang / 'khrug pa myed par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par 'gyurar
95b5(mdo): rgyal mo chen po dag dge' slong ngam/ dge la slong ma'o// bsnyen ni dge' bsnyes mya gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'jand pa dag la mi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus
95b6(mdo): 'di lta bus sti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ ris 'grong byed/ mchod pa byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang gnod ldan brgya sto
95b7(mdo): ma dag sogs kyi rnas pa byin na pa'i rgyal po de/ bsod nas sa mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dgel ba mdzod par 'du byed pa de dang / 'dral lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen
95b8(mdo): bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ te 'di la rgyal po'i ga'i brjid chen po bas pa rgyas mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dpal dang thun sum 'tsho
96a1(mdo): pa dang ga mi brjin kyis kyang brgyam par 'gyur ro// phyimargol ba'i sems cad dang / dgral thams cad chos dang mthun pas shin tu cha gcod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal
96a2(mdo): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po do dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gapal la zhig kyi'i rgyal po kya da la/ de chos la gus pa de lta bus gser 'od dam pa
96a3(mdo): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan ma/ dgel slong ngam/ dge' slong ma 'am/ dge' bsnyen dang / dgel bsnyen la mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa de dag la yang sti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim 'gro 'gyir
96a4(mdo): mchod pa bgyid cing ra/ rgyal po chen po bdag cag kyi slad du rgyal bo'i pho brang de shi nad dag par phyag dar bgyid/ spos chab sA tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'dres la/ bdag cag rgyal
96a5(mdo): be chen po bzhi dam lhan cig/ mthun khong du chos mnyan pa de nyan cis bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du dgel ba'i rtsa ba'i shas cung zad cig sbyin par bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan langs dge' slong chos
96a6(mdo): sba ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag du myo'i rgyal po des bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'din kyi srad du spos sna tshogs kyis gdug par bgyi'o// btsud pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dang
96a7(mdo): po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du bdug pas bdugs ma thag tu spos sna tshogs rnams las spos dang gdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag 'byung bar gyurd te/ de dag skad pa ma sa de la rgyal po chen po bzhi
96a8(mdo): rang dang gyi khang pa'i sted kyi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po 'ayang mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i skapa
96b1(mdo): 'byung bar 'gyur zhingapa/ snang ba des bdag cag kyi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang gdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag skad cig wang cog ud tsam de la myol
96b2(mdo): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen mo brtan pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde
96b3(mdo): chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin kyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin kyi sde dpon chen po nor du bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgyal 'khor dang bcas
96b4(mdo): pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / de dag gis rang rang gyi khang pa'i steng gyi dbar snang la byung ste/ spos dang gdug pa sna tshogs kyi
96b5(mdo): shapa gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dris tshogs rgya chen po 'amang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams nang du gser d+ha snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing sa snang ba des gnas
96b6(mdo): thams cad snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsolang pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' su lang tod/ rgyal po chen po dag rgyal po chen po khyed bzhil rang
96b7(mdo): rang gi khab pa rnams kyi sted kyi bar ska la/ spos dpa gdug pa sna tshogs kyi khro shong de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par ma zad do// de mil phyir zhe na/ rgyal po cher po dag mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa
96b8(mdo): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'od la mchod pa'i phyir spos sna tshogs de dag gyis gdugs ma thag tu/ lag na pog phor gyi snod cig thogs pa de la spos dang / gdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing rnams 'byung bar
97a1(mdo): 'gyur te/ de skad cig zang cog yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na/ gang na zla pa phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya la dang / 
97a2(mdo): rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ngong rgyal ba med pa bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang / khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling bzhi pa
97a3(mdo): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi sa ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum bcu la rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya nas 'du shes myemed kyi ma par song pa'i bar gyi yu bye ba khrag
97a4(mdo): khrig phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gi stong chen po 'jig rten/ na gyi khams de dag thams cad du sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye drub phrag brgya po thams cad na/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang
97a5(mdo): dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha lding dang / mi 'am ci da lto 'phye chen po de'i tshogs rnams kyi rang rang gi khang pa de dgag snyed gyi bar snang la spos dang / gdug pa tshogs kyi khri shing
97a6(mdo): de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur// spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnams su gseng ki kha dog lta bu'i sdang ba yang 'bya ba par 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang lha
97a7(mdo): khar pa rnams sngangs 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum yi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lA'i kham pa thams cad kyikyi 'di skad la spos dang gdug pa'i khri shing de dgag
97a8(mdo): nams su gnas pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po des spos sna tshogs de dag gis gdugs ma thag tu/ gser 'od dam
97b1(mdo): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus spos dang / gdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig dza cig / yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
97b2(mdo): du ma gang 'ga'i klung bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag tu ma yang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi khar snang ma
97b3(mdo): spos dang gdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing gi gdugs su gnas par 'gyur// de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la spos dang gdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnas par 'gyur
97b4(mdo): gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig dbargya stong ka ga'i klur kyi bye ma snyed dag snang bar byas par 'gyu
97b5(mdo): ro// rgyal po chen po dag cho 'phrul chen po de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khra ka khrig brgya sto thag du ma gang ka'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag chos smra ba de la dgongs
97b6(mdo): par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// skyes bu dam khyed ka ser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po tshul 'di lta bu zab mo'i don 'di lta bu zab mom snang ba 'di lta bu yon tan pas ma
97b7(mdo): kyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di sa bu rgya che yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa khyed yang legs so legs so zhes bya ba sbyin papa 'gyur ro// su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
97b8(mdo): po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge' ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur nga na/ ga pa dag 'dzind pa dang / 'char ba dang / 'chad pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa rgyu
98a1(mdo): 'khor la rgya sem yang dag par rab tu ston pa la spos kyang mi dgas/ de rol phyir zhes skyes bu dam pa gser 'od dam pa 'do sde 'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di chos ma lal tu byung / 
98a2(mdo): rgyachub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bla na myed pa ang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi shing bye ba zhwas
98a3(mdo): zig pas stong phrag dul gang 'ga'i klung kyi bye ma snyed dkan/ de bzhin gshenas pa bye ba khras 'an brgya gang brag du ma nga ni sangs rgyas kyi shing na bzhunas bden tu ma de'i mi de'i dus na/ chog ga ci
98a4(mdo): dang / ngag gcig dang / sma skad gcig gis dgel slong chos smra ba chos kyi stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro
98a5(mdo): bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyed byachub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ shid kyi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug ste/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par
98a6(mdo): tu 'phags pa'i bya sems can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang gathub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyu
98a7(mdo): skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po legs par brgya nad par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ skyes
98a8(mdo): su dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal ba'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud sde bsam kyis kyi khyab pa gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ mi sdug pa stod de pa yang gzugs kyi sdug pa sna tshogs
98b1(mdo): dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpel myed pa/ rab tu zhi ba rdul dang nga bral
98b2(mdo): ba zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i padan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod mchog tu zab pa
98b3(mdo): bla na myed pa rnam bcu gnyis rab tu spong par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla na byed chung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi dung bla ra myed pa 'bud par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam
98b4(mdo): pa khyod chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po sbeng bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dedas pa khyod chos kyi sgron ma bla na byed pa 'bar bar byed par 'gyu ra/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi char bla na myed pa 'bebs pa
98b5(mdo): 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i dgra stong phra ga du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems cad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma shi nang tu 'jigs su
98b6(mdo): rung ba/ 'jigs pa chen po'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems cad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongs su tha rad par byed par
98b7(mdo): 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsa lad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen
98b8(mdo): po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsolang to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang tshe 'di dang ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba 'di lta bu dag ma
99a1(mdo): ma la rgyas song thag la rgya'i dga' ba'is pa bskyed pa/ bsod dmas kyi phung po dpag tu ma mdzes pa yongs su 'dzid par thong nas snang brje ba'i slad du
99a2(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye stong phrag du ma rang gyi kha ba pa na mchis pa dag spos dang gdug pa sna tshogs kyi zhe na
99a3(mdo): ngag gi gdugs kyi bskul ma thag tu lus kyi 'das par bgyis te/ rtsi'i rgyal po de'i khang pa brtsegs pa phyag dar ma mchis pa/ legs par phyag dngabagyis pa/ spos chab sna tshogs/ 
99a4(mdo): kyis chug chag legs par btab pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba deng chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi par bgyi'o// mi mched kyi bang
99a5(mdo): po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin dang / lha mo cher so dbyangs can sa dang / lha mo chen po dpal dang / sa'i lha mo btan pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gno
99a6(mdo): byin kyi se dpon chen po nyi bus brgyan dang / su'i bu dbang phyag chen po dang / mnod sun gyi sde dpon chen po lag na re rje dang / gnod sgos sde dpon chen po nor bu bdang / 'brog sa'i bu
99a7(mdo): lnga brgyal 'khor can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / sa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag lus kyi gda' bang bgyis te/ phyi'i rgyal po del
99a8(mdo): brang sna tshogs kyis rgya nang bde ga la ba dang / chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgya nad pa me tog bkram pa'is la bshams par 'gyur ba ka la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slar
99b1(mdo): ces kyi par 'gyur ngo // btsun pa bcom sas 'das bdag cag rgyam ze chen po ba'i dpung dpon mog tu gnas bu gnod sun pa rgya stong blag tu ma de dag thams cad mthun par bgyis te/ ma'i rtsem/ 
99b2(mdo): bo dgel ba'i grogs bgyid pa/ dge ba 'thob par bgyid pa/ bla na myed pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur sa thag tu mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung
99b3(mdo): bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang de dang / grong khyer de dang / yul de dang
99b4(mdo): kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyed pa dang / zhi ba dang de legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// chad pa spangs par yang bgyi'o// 
99b5(mdo): sub de yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / rang 'gro ba pa dang / 'khrug las yongs su pa dad mer bgyi'o bcum pa bad pa ldan 'das gang la la rig pa'i rgyal po babyed
99b6(mdo): mi'i rgyal po de'i yul tu gser 'od das pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bya la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi lce rgyal po de dge' slob ngas dge' slong ma 'am/ dge' snyen nas/ dgel
99b7(mdo): snyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzind pa dag la sti sAng mi bgyid/ bla sar gyi bgyid rim 'gro bgyid mchod par byigyid na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po pa yi
99b8(mdo): gnod sbyin bye ma ma na sa chos bdud rtsi 'i lu la 'dis rim par mi bgyid/ rim gro myo 'gyid/ khA li lus 'di dag gi ka'i las pa 'phel par gyi gyid/ bdag gi bco
100a1(mdo): 'grus dang / marbu dpa stobs kyang kyi skyed/ bdag can kyi lus la ga'i 'arjid dang / dpal dang phun sum 'tshogs pa sang nam par 'thos par yang mi bgyid do// btsun
100a2(mdo): pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po pa'i dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag tu ma dag gis yul de yal bar dong par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan
100a3(mdo): 'das bdag cag kyis yul de al bang por na/ yul na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang yul de yal par 'dor par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul yal pa
100a4(mdo): bor na/ yul der yul rnam par 'khrugs pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams/ cad kyang 'jab pa skye ba dang / mtshar madru ba skye ba dang / brjod
100a5(mdo): ba skye bar 'gyur/ dgongs pa dang 'gyed par 'gyur / dang / gza' dang nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul bu 'byung ba 'gyur/ phyogs ka dad pa nas skar mdal ltung bar 'gyur/ karbal
100a6(mdo): rang rgya skar rnams kyang phan tshun gyi thun par gad par 'gyur// ku zla 'char ba na nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i gza' dang nyi ma'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi a dang zla ba nam mkha' la
100a7(mdo): gnas pasas btag par rgyan tu sna gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus su nam mkha' la 'ja'i kha dog lta bu 'khyim par 'gyur/ sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i
100a8(mdo): khron pa yang sA 'byin pa yang klag par 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po 'byung bar 'gyur/ cha ma khrag po 'bab par 'gyur/ yul du su ke'i dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha ro yid kyi dmag tshogs
100b1(mdo): kyis yul 'joms par 'gyung / sul de phung bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams mi dgal bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
100b2(mdo): rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin stong zag du ma dang / yul na gnas pa'i sa dang / klu rnams kyis yul de yal ba por na yul de bde lte bu'i gnod pa
100b3(mdo): sna tshogs rgya dang gnon pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la shig mo'i rgyal por rgyar nga la/ de bdag nyid la kun tu bsrub bar chen po bgyid 'chal bar gyuras/ rgyal
100b4(mdo): bai'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myong bar 'tshal bar gyur dra/ bde ba thams cad bstabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid brtso 'tshal bar gyur da yul na gan pa'i sems can thams cad bde ba bgyid
100b5(mdo): 'tshal bar gyur/ pha ro lod kyi dmag tshogs thams cad phan par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ yul thams cad teyud ring du yongs su spong 'dul bar gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po
100b6(mdo): nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyud/ rang gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nang 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad chos yongs su yad par bgyid 'jal par gyur nga/ brgyas pa
100b7(mdo): ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal par ka ser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyil/ dge' slong ngam/ dge' slong ma 'am/ dge' snyen nas/ dge' bsnyen ma
100b8(mdo): 'am/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa de dag la yang sti stang bgyir/ bla ma bgyi/ rim 'gro bgyil/ mchod pa bkyil/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams
101a1(mdo): kyang chos nyam pa'i dge' ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu pa 'dis tshim par bgyi/ bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi chen po yang rnam par 'phel par bgyid
101a2(mdo): mo// rnama'i phyir zhes/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yi'i rgyal po des gdon mo 'tshal bar gseng 'od dam pa mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par brgya ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang pos
101a3(mdo): 'jig rtend pa'i dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos/ rnam pa sna tshogs ji'i snyed bstand pa dag dang / lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis bstand bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstand pa dang / 
101a4(mdo): drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis so/ dmas can rnams kyi don skad du/ na ma nad las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa ji snyed bstand pa dka pas che sa mchog ces kyang
101a5(mdo): bar du 'phags pa/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang brgya phrag stong de dag dang / rgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya song
101a6(mdo): phrag du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong thams cad pas ches mchog ces khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang
101a7(mdo): dag par bshad pa lags so// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ji ltar sems can thams cad bde' bab 'argyang ba dang / ji ltar rang gyi yul kun
101a8(mdo): bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bskyangs pa dang / ji ltar yul thams cad na gnod pa dang dgra' ma mchis par 'gyur bapa dang / ji ltar pha rold kyi dmag tshogs rnams pham ste/ phyir phyogs
101b1(mdo): par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul de dag mnad 'gol ba la mchis shing 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / pi ltar yul thams cad chos kyis 'phongs pa ma mchis shing yi ji bAr 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar gyi/ 
101b2(mdo): rgyal po de dag kyis rang rab gyi yul rnamasas su chos kyi sngon ma chen po 'babar bar bgyis shing snang bar bgyis par dang / ji yang lha'i khang khyim thams cad lha dag dang o'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur
101b3(mdo): dang / ji ltang bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang gsog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyid brgya stong phrag du ma dang / 'dzam bu li gling na gnas pa'i lha tsha sa thams cad tshim pa dang / rab 'gro
101b4(mdo): bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag ki lha'i lus 'dadag gzi brjid chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus brtson 'grus dang stobs dang mchu chen po
101b5(mdo): bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la ga'i brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gleng lams cad lo las
101b6(mdo): shing nyams dga' la/ skye bo dang kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs slong bar 'gyur ba dang
101b7(mdo): nga ltar sems can thams cad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig pas stong phrag du yang lha dang po'i bde pa rgyam ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur bar/ 
101b8(mdo): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de thams cad da stan/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dgral bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa
102a1(mdo): sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba zhan khrig brgya stong dag pas ches 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / rgya byi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gyi
102a2(mdo): 'gas pa bas ches 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na myed pa dang / drang srob mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad pas ches 'phags
102a3(mdo): ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i
102a4(mdo): gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do// mi'i rgyal po ni dgos pa dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyas rab kyi bgang dga'i dzas bu'i gling khams cad na mchis pa dang / 
102a5(mdo): gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba do dag thams cad bcom lam 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' 'jom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gse pa'o
102a6(mdo): de'i byung ba'i 'di skye ba bstadang / yongs su brjod/ yang dag par btu bshad / na pa malda 'das kyi de rten des skye mas po des gdon pa 'as bdag
102a7(mdo): dbang po'i da na pa kyis pa da na/ zhus pa ma pa // sa mi gas sang pa dang / ldanan 'das sa
102a8(mdo): po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces paka' stsal to// de bya sa rgyal po khyed pa'i dpung dpag sog tu bcas pas gdon min bar po'i rgyal lo gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa
102b1(mdo): rim 'gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu bsung ba'i phyir spo ba cher gyis shig// rgyal po chen po dag dgal slong dam/ dge' slong ma 'am/ dge' snyen nam/ dge la snyen ma mdo sde'i dbang
102b2(mdo): dbong 'dzind pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug shika dang / de dag lha dang mi deng lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtem 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
102b3(mdo): dbang po'i rgyal po 'od rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi 'os minas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa'i dge' slong dang / dgel slong ma dang / dge' bsnyen dang / dge la bsnyen
102b4(mdo): ma bsrung ba dang / gnod pa myed pa dang / nad myed pa dang / 'khyug pa myed pa dang / sems bde bar 'gyur zhing kaser 'od dam pa mdo sa 'i dbang po la rgyal po 'di yang dag papa ga tu stond par 'gyur
102b5(mdo): da'adzung / dges slong sa la/ dal bskyen napa/ bsnyen pa san sde'i dab po 'dzid pa de dag ku tu 'gyung bas su bskrum pa dang/ su bzung 'ang
102b6(mdo): yongs su babyung ba dang / oM pa dang pad legs su 'gyung bar bya'o// de ngas rgyal chen pon ma rol kyi zu rje/ rgyas po chen po sral 'khor srung dang / rgyam mi chen po 'phags skyes pa dang / 
102b7(mdo): chen po myig myo ba'ang stan la langs te bla kos zag pa kacig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa sa btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ka la pa der sogs su thal mo sum btud nas de'i che mngon ka sus du
102b8(mdo): mul dang mthung pa'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngos par spyod do// rgyas pa sri dri ma byed pa'i skuH/ rgyal ba nyi ma 'ong mer stong kyi 'od// rgyal ba pad lo dris byed pa'i spyan// 
103a1(mdo): rgyal la kye tog pad ma rdul myed tshems// rgyal ba'i yon tam rgya ma tsho u khru ste// rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung na mi gyu da/ rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes rgyas ga / ting 'dzin de brgya phra/ 
103a2(mdo): sto gyis kun tu kapa// rgyal ba'i zhabras ni 'khor los bris pa ste// 'khor yug su khyud de bzhin rtsibs stong // phyag dang 'bas ni dra bas smras pa ste/ zhabs kyi rna pa dang pa'i dbang po bzhin// gse da pa
103b1(mdo): rgya lo legs nyams kyang dka' 'gyur zhing // 'dzam bu'i gli ni thams dag na sa // sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba gyis// 'din mi'i dbang po gang rnams ni// yul la dka' dang bdag bde
103b2(mdo): dga' ba dang // rgyal srid rnam khar 'byor la dkal ba des// mdo sde'i dam pa po 'di ni mnyan pas bya// pha rold dgral ni yang dag 'ad byed pa// pha rol dgral tshogs zlog pa dge' byed pa// mchog tu 'jigs
103b3(mdo): pas phongs pa sel byed pa// mchog tu dge 'a byed mdo sde'i dbang po 'di'o// ji lta ma rin chen ljon shing rab mdzes pa/ yon tan kun 'byung khyim na yod pa ltar// rgyal po yon tan
103b4(mdo): 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di dade yang bstsal// pi lta rgya grang sgom pa ses byed pa/ dpapas nyams lag che ni rnyed pa ltung // yon tan dag kyis smos pa
103b5(mdo): rgyal po la// mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no// ji ltar rin chen thams cad 'byung ba la gnas/ rin chen no/ da ni lag 'thil yod pa ltar// mi'i dbang po tshogs la gser 'od
103b6(mdo): mchog/ mdo sde'i dbang po mchog 'di de bzhin no// 'di ni lha'i tshogs kyis mngon mchod pa// mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyug byas pa// 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po pa// bzhi po dag kIs
103b7(mdo): kun d+ha bsrungs pa yin// phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang // do sde'i dbang po 'di ni rtag tu dgongs// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni bkad pa na// sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs shes mdzod
103b8(mdo): ba byin// gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dag du yul yang srung par byed// rab tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis// mdo sA li dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed// 'dzem bu
104a1(mdo): sri da gnas pang rgyan pa'i// sum chogs rnams bsam chis kyi byu pa// ma tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas// mad sde'i dbang po 'don nyan mar byed// sa rnam
104a2(mdo): mnyan 'ar bya ba 'di yin// ka'i 'did dang na gosas dang brtsod 'grus 'og// ga'i 'dzi chen po'is ni lha'i lus// gnang tu rgyas shing nas par 'phel bar 'gyur// denas rgyas po chen po bzhis
104a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das las tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di gsos pa dang / ngom cad du gyurar// mad du byung bar gyur nga / dka' bar gyur te/ de dag chos kyi shugs kyis ud tsam zhig tus nas mam su
104a4(mdo): rtsis te/ de dag lus 'phang / yan lag 'das zhing dga' de ba dang bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur na nas/ ang bcom ldan 'das la yA'i me tog shan du
104a5(mdo): pa dag gis gtor da mngon par gtodad to// mngon par ga rad nas kyang stan rnams yas langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gci tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te
104a6(mdo): ma ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su thal po spya pa bdun nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal po chen po/ 
104a7(mdo): gnod spyon lnga brgya lA rgya dang / chos su ba de bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du/ rtag tu dge slong chos sla ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar 'gyi'o// 
104a8(mdo): dad pa'i mdo sde 'i dbang po rgyal po los/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la lu zhes bya ba ste/ bdun pa'o// / de nas lha mo chen po dbyangs can gyis
104b1(mdo): ko sa phrag bya k+ka cig tu bgos te/ pus mo gas pa'i lha bas la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su zhal mo spyad pa btud te nang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// 
104b2(mdo): bcan bya ba ma ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma bdag gis kyang dge la slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyand pa de'i slad du/ spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ gzungs kyang su lad par bgyi'i/ nges
104b3(mdo): pa'i tshig gi brjod pa kun tu gzhag par bgyi/ dgel slong chos smra ba de la ye shes kyi snang ba chen po bgyi// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig gam yi ge gang yang
104b4(mdo): rung ba dag cig yongs su mnyan par gyurard tam/ bskyud na/ bdag gis dge la slong chos smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang tshig dang / yi kau thams cad bsdul pam bgyi'o// ji ltar ngesas rgyas pa
104b5(mdo): ldan 'das brgya stong dag la dga' ba'i rtsa ba bskrund pa'o// sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'o dpang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na ring du gnas shing
104b6(mdo): mya da tu nub par gyi 'gyur ba dang / sems can du ma dag gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'od thos nas shes rab no ba bsam gyis kyi khyab par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi phung
104b7(mdo): bsam gyis kyi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di la phun sum 'tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / srog la phan gdags pa dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa ra
104b8(mdo): tu 'dzind par 'gyur ba dang / thabs sna tshogs rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / bzo' bgyi ba da sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa 'a
105a1(mdo): par 'gyur ba dang / bskyed pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la gzungs kyang stsal par bgyi'o// dge' slong chos sba ba de dang / sems can chos nyan pa de dag
105a2(mdo): ka don gyi slad du sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi las brjod par bgyi ste/ gza' dang rgya skar dang skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang rtog pa dang / 'khrug rlong dang / phrug
105a3(mdo): khrug dang / bi lam ngan pa dang / log 'den gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byad dang mo langs thams cad rab tu ni kham 'gyur/ gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du su lad pa'i sman dang
105a4(mdo): sngags ni 'di dag s+ho// bu dga' gi tshang 'bunadasug dang / sha s+ya sha myi shi ran// dbang po'i lag dang skam pa che// dzA ma shing tsha a ga s+ya// shai ri bye sta sra rtsi dang / 
105a5(mdo): ku ku la ra sa sha la la kaM/ de dreg lo ma brgyalaspos dang // tsan dang dang ni ldong ros dang // 'go'u dang btsas ruH dang // kur kum klas skad yungs kar dang // spyi song sug
105a6(mdo): spem ma la dang / gnag she sam sa shi ma// 'di dag sa ni mnyam bgyis nas skams brgyas byuHga par brtso // skyes la ni sngags tshig 'di// lan brgya mngon par gad ba ba brgyal// 
105a7(mdo): da? yA nA/ su kr-i twe/ kA mA li/ na li/ dza na ka ra te/ hang kang rte/ iradrA dza li sha kad te/ ba shad tre/ a bA ra rta ka si ke/ na ku/ tra ku/ ka bI la/ ma ti shi la ma ti/ sa
105a8(mdo): r-i shi ri/ sad t+ya sI te sa tA// l+ri bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas ni/ me tog sil ma dgram par 'gyi// kamed kyi snod dang dngul snod tu// dngang ba'i
105b1(mdo): khu ba bzha khar bkyil// skyes bu ko cha bgos pa ni// bzhi zhig deng yang gzhag par bgyi// rab tu brgya nad pa'i bu mo bzhi/ bus pa thogs pa gzhag par bgyil// rtag tu ku ku la
105b2(mdo): gdug pas bkyil ga sil snyan sA lnga bgyid du sA lang// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan gyis// lA mo de ni legs par brgyand// bab ba bdag tu me long bzhag mda' dang mdung rtsenathang
105b3(mdo): bzhag/ de nas 'tshams kyang bcad par bgyi// de'i 'og tu dgos pa brtsam// sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis// mtshams bcad pa yang brtsam papa bgyi// sad ya me dang / ar ke// 
105b4(mdo): a ne/ hi le/ mI le/ ki le/ khi khi le sAn+ta bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su khrus bgyis nas/ sngags 'dri bzlas brjod bgyid na/ khrus kyis zhi bar sbyor ro/ gtad 5
105b5(mdo): sa ka te/ bi ga Ta/ bi ga tA ba ti sA tA/ a phyogs bzhi dag na gang gnas pa'i// rgya skar dag gis tshe srung sa shig/ btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang // phung po'i
105b6(mdo): las kyi 'jigs 'byung dang // 'byung po khams rnams 'azhugs bgyid pa// 'jigs pa mi ba'ang zhi 'gyur dacig/ sa me/ bi sha me/ swa hA/ sa ka te/ bi ka te sAhA/ sa ka
105b7(mdo): sam bu tu ta ya sA hA/ skad du mA mA sa sA hA/ mi la ka na \u0f7f yA sA da/ a pa rA dzaM ta biR+ya ya sA hA/ hi sa bad sam bu lu ta ya sA hA/ a ni mi la pag tra ya srA hwA/ na mo b+ha ka
105b8(mdo): te/ pra mA na Na ma sA ra sA twe de byai sid tan tu man tra pa tra/ ta sa b+h+ra mA nu ma n+ya du swA hA/ dge' slong chos smra ba de bsrung ba dang / chos nyan pa de/ dag dang / ye gepa 'dri ba de dag
106a1(mdo): gi don gyi slad du/ zhus kyi las 'dis bdag nyid depa 'chi bar bgyi// lha'i tshogs sems cad dang / lhan cig tu grong ngas grong khyer ram/ grong rdal yaM/ gtsug lag []
106a2(mdo): der na thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// ji ltar dge' slong ngam/ dge' slong ma 'am/ dge' bsnyen nas/ dgel bsnyen la mdo sde'i da pa'i rgyal po 'dzind pa de dag gi srog la pan gdags
106a3(mdo): bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor pa las 'byung ba 'dong ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las byer mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / myurang du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
106a4(mdo): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gza' dang / 'thab pa dang / rtog pa dang / bcas pa'i skar ma'i gnod/ pa dang / rmi las ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad
106a5(mdo): dang / byad dang ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dbyangs can la/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la
106a6(mdo): bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ khyod kyis sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di 'dra ba bshad pa legs so// legs so zhes bya ba byin no// lha mo dbyangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
106a7(mdo): tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas slob dpon lung stond pa bram ze ko lu 'in papa/ lha mo dbyangs can de bkug go// lha mo dbyangs can mchod 'os dka' thub che// 'jig rten kun
106a8(mdo): tunam grangs mchog byir yon tan che// rtser gnas mdzes ma dngang cwa yis gos bsdus pa// dang bu 'i \u0f88\u0f90'i gos gyon rkang pa gcig gyis gnas/ lha rnams thams cad lpags nas 'di skad tshig smram
106b1(mdo): sems can rnams la dgol ba'i tshig god se zhol cig// sad ya e dAn/ n+yar/ ma~M/ a pa ste/ ma brdza ba ti/ tsi hi ku ye/ bying ku le/ bi ka la pa ti/ mu ku she/ sa ri tsi/ 
106b2(mdo): digs ti/ a kr-i/ ma kr-i/ tang siH8/ tsa pa ti/ tsitsi r-i/ kau r-I/ mi rI/ sA ri rtsi/ blan ye/ lo ka dze she/ lo ka shre Sh+Ta/ lo ka tr-i ye/ sid d+ha pra te/ byi ma su khyi/ tsu rtsi la di/ 
106b3(mdo): pra ti he te/ a pra ti ha ta/ bud tI/ na mu tsi/ na su mi/ ma ha de pi/ pra ti gr-i nA/ na ya skA ra na/ bdag gi blo thogs pa myed par rgya da cig/ bstand bcos dang tshigs su bcad pa'i rgyud dang / 
106b4(mdo): snod dang / snyan sngags la sogs pa la bdag gi rigs dgas dngos grub du gyur cig// tad ya ShA/ ma ha/ pra b+ha Thahi yi hi li/ mi li mi yi// bcom ldan 'das ma lha ma
106b5(mdo): dbyangs can gyis mthus/ bdag rnam par rgyus par gyur da cig// ka rI te/ ke yu/ shu re/ ke ya 'ur ba ti/ hi li mi/ li/ hi li mi li// / sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden
106b6(mdo): pa dang / dge la 'dun gyi bden pa dang / dbang po'i bden pa dang / chu lha'i bden pas lha mo chen mo dgug par bgyi'o// kar dag 'jog rten na bden pa smra ba de dag gi bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gis
106b7(mdo): lha mo chen po dkrug par bya'o// tad ya ya/ ti li mi l-i/ ti li mo li/ d+hi li mi yi// bdag nam yang rgya bar rgyur nga cig/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal lo// bdan
106b8(mdo): gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur da cig sA hA// de nas slob dpon lung stond pa bram ze ku lu di na rgyas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can lha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par stong
107a1(mdo): 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad nga la nyan par gyis // ha swa dang drim lha dbang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ bud myed dam pa lha mo mchog gi rab gang yin// lha mo dma'i mchog
107a2(mdo): rtag ta nul ngem pa'i kAT la bstod// yon tan nam pa sna tshogs bsags pas yan lag brgyadang // dbyangs can zhes byang sman ni yangs gang bsod nams 'bang / dri myed ye sem yin tan nams kyis
107a3(mdo): rnam par rgyas rin chen sna tshogs la dang lta bu blta ba'i phyir// mchog rab drag gi yom tan de khyad par de bstod do// dam pa mchog gi dngos grub byed pa dang / yang dag bsngags dang yon tan byed pa dang / 
107a4(mdo): dri med mchog da pad ma 'bar ba dang // myig mchog dang ni khyisag dam pa dang // dge' ba'i gnas dang dgel ba'i mthong pa da // som tan bsam du med pas brgya nang pa dang // zla ba 'dra dang / 
107a5(mdo): dril myed 'od dang // ye shes 'byung gnas dran pa dam pa dang // seng ge mchog dang kyil zhon pa dang // lag pargyan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa dang // zla ba nya ba lta bur snang ba dang // yid du
107a6(mdo): 'ong ba'i ngag dam dbyangs snyan dang // shes rab zab mo dang ni ldan pa dang // dgos mchog grub byed sems can dam pa dang // la rapal phyin dbang pos mchod pa dang // lha dang lha myi mtshogs kun gnas
107a7(mdo): badz+rod dang // 'byung po'i tshogs kyi gnas ni rtag tu mtshon pa'i phyir// swa hA// bdag cag lha mo 'di la phyag bya'o// bdag la yon tan khyad par sbyang stso la cig/ dgos pa kun tu bdag la
107a8(mdo): dngos mug g.yo med/ dgra' rnams khrid na bdag rtag rtag tu srungs/ yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dag ni// nang par langs nas gtsangasapa brjod par bya// bsam pa na nopo 'phrul sa
107b1(mdo): da rnyed/ dngos grub dge 'a pa rgya chen thob par 'gyur// / gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbapa pos rgyas po/ las/ lha mo dbyangs can ma'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ brgyad pa'o// 
107b2(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mi chen mo dpal bdag gis kyang ci nas chos snga pa'i dgel slong de byung thams cad phun sum
107b3(mdo): tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / brel phongs ma mchis pa thog par 'gyur ba dang / sems tas par 'gyur ba dang / sems bde bas gdugs mtshan gyis gnas par 'gyur ba dang / er 'od dam pa mdo sde
107b4(mdo): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'di las tshig dang ye ge rnam pa ma dad pa dag nga chub par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par rtog par 'byung ba dang / yang dag par rjod par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas brgya sto
107b5(mdo): dka la dge' ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don slad du gsepa 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po dri 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing
107b6(mdo): rgyan du sa par yong mi 'gyur ba dang / sems pa mas kyang gi nga na dang 'di 'i'i dbang po rgyas tho 'di nyan par 'byung ba dang / bskam pa bye ba bcu stong phrag du ma la dang kyi'i bde ba
107b7(mdo): par 'gyur ba dang / su ke ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / lo legs par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang bde bar spya pa thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ba dang de bzhin
107b8(mdo): gshegs pa dang / grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla ma byed la sa dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdzod par rdzogs 'tshang mthar 'byung ba dang / sems can dpyas ba
108a1(mdo): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gzhin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu chad par 'gyur bar gapa 'di gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / mapa'i gsos sum dang / 
108a2(mdo): yo byad dang 'tshogs chas gzhan dag gis kyang dgel slong chos smra ba de spro bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs dgral bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog/ yon tan rgya mtsho
108a3(mdo): phye du rgya dang / gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de la su ma chen mo dpal gyis dge' ba'i rtsa ba skyed te/ des da lta phyogs gang dang gang du sems pa dang / phyogs gang dang ga
108a4(mdo): tulwa ba dang / phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang depe/ sems cas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong zag du la dag bde bar phu/ pa thams cad kyis 'de bar 'gyur/ zas dang / skom dang nod dang
