368a3(mdo): lus gcig gis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/ lus mtha' yas pa las ldang bar sems can la kun tu stond pa/ lus gcig gis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub la/ sems can
368a4(mdo): thams cad skyed kyi lus kund tu ston pa/ sems can tham sa cad kyi lus sems can gcig gi lus su kun tu ston/ pa/ sems can gcig gi lus sems can thams can
368a5(mdo): lus su kun tu stond pa/ sems can gyi lus chos kyi skuran tu ston pa/ chos kyi skur sems can gyi lus su ston pa byang chub sems dpal thams cad kyi smon lam/ nga gi smon lam
368a6(mdo): du byin gyis rlob pa la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams las sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / smon lam dang stobs dang / mngon par rdzogs nga byang rgyal bar kun
368a7(mdo): ston de pa yongs su sbyind pa'i sems can la 'dul ba ji lta la bzhin du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun tu stond pa/ bskal pa 'grangs sna thams cad du smon lam kyi rgyan phyin na rnam
368a8(mdo): rnam par shes pa'i lus las bskyod nas/ ye shes kyi sku la 'jog par dbang byed par sems can gyi tshogs thams cad la kun tu stond pa/ rang gi lus kyi rgyan bcad nas sems can gyi tshogs gan
368b1(mdo): smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed par kund tu stond pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su spyand par byed pa'i smon lam la 'jug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bskal pa'i grangs thams
368b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun myi gcod pa/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par smon lam btab pa'i stobs kyis sgra tsam gyi khyon gcig la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gyengs pa'i
368b3(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du myed par kund tu stond pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu lus tu ma kund tu stond pa/ chos kyi tshig gcig brjod pas chos kyi dbyings ma lus ya rgyas por 'byings pa'i chos
368b4(mdo): kyi sprin chen po las byung ba'i btud ci'i khu ba'i chang 'bebs / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i klog byung zhing yang dag pa/ na'i 'brug bsgrags pas sems can gyi rnam
368b5(mdo): bar byed cing smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed par kun da tu stond pa/ bsam gtan dang rnam par tha rad pa dang / mdon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / ye ges ma 'jug pa'i spyod gum
368b6(mdo): sems bskyed pa gcig gam phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'gro ba'i skye ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yum kun su skrod dpa/ rang gi se ma
368b7(mdo): ba dang / gzhan gyi sems shes pa chags pa byed pas sems can gcig dang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi 'aspyod pa dang / g.yol ba shes las mkham pa de 'azhid zhig nas 'i 'os 'char sto / 
368b8(mdo): cag gcig gis 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ nus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad kyi grangs la chags pa byed pa ye shes 'jug pa/ sems can gnan gyi da pa dzin 'ang na rgya byo
369a1(mdo): ye shes la mkhas pa/ sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cigs phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du sems can pacos cadas mngon par rdzogs par/ 
369a2(mdo): byang chub par ku nad tu ston da pa la mkhas pa/ sems can gcig gi 'du shes kyis sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi las kyi bya ba su mngon gsum tu 'jug pa'i ye shes pa mkhas pa/ sems can
369a3(mdo): gcig gi sgra skad kyis sems can thams cad kyi skad la 'jug par stond pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ sus gcig la dmyags la sems can thams cad kyi lus pa dmyigs par kunan tu stond pa
369a4(mdo): la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil/ da 'a khor du 'jug5/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 2khor gyi dkyil 'khor na chos ston da pa ku ni tu 'dzind yal mkhas
369a5(mdo): pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang gzungs thams cad thob pa/ shi nad tu rnam par nges pa'i spobs pas ston cing sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi dbang po 'dzin du na mkhyas
369a6(mdo): sems can gcig ka sems la dbyigs pas brjod tu byed pa'i rgyud tu byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing sems can thams cad kyi sems la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas2/ da ci ko rma
369a7(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du go bar byid cing / sems can thams cad kyi bsam gyis myi khyal pa'i nges pa shes la/ sems can gzhan gyi rgyud la yang dag 'ar thog par byed pa sa ye shes lam
369a8(mdo): pa/ sngon gyi mtha' mu'i bskal da pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro la thams cad sems bsam gyis myi khyab pa rjes su dran la la 'jug pas// las dang bya ba dang 'bras bu rnam par smin po dz+ra lta bu bzhi
369b1(mdo): mngon gsum du sems can la stond cide sems can la shes par byed pa la mkhas pa 'jig rten bya khams thams cad brgyan pa la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du kun nas 'adz+yog
369b2(mdo): la mkhas lan sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / bdag gi spyod pa dang / smon lam yang dag par skyed cing / chos kyi sdang ba rab tu gtong lal mkhas pa// rdul phra ngab kyi rdu
369b3(mdo): gcig la bskal pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du myed pa la 'jug pa la mkhas pa/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi tshed tsam gyi sangs rgyas kyi de'i klas te kun
369b4(mdo): stond pa la mkhas pa/ mtshol chen po rgya mtsho'i chu'i phung po thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig tu bcug ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshad tsam gyi la jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro yang / skye ma myanan rnams
369b5(mdo): gnod pa byed pa la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du rtse// da pa rang gi yus su 'jug cing sems can gyi bya ba thams cad kun tu ston da ya la mkhas pa/ 'o yug dang khor yug zid pa dang
369b6(mdo): chen po gzhan grangs myed cing bsam byas myi khyab la mtshungs pa skye da cing gzhal du myed de tshad byed la brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa dag spu'i 'ung bu gcig tu bajug ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshad tsam
369b7(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro yang sems can rnams skrag par myi 'gyur ba la mkhas pa/ bskald pa brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa/ bskal da yA gcig tu phyin gyis rlol ci8/ bsnye da
369b8(mdo): gcig 'jig pa dang / 'chags pa'i bskald pa brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du myed par kun tu stond pa la mkhas pa/ 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams rgyad la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad chus
370a1(mdo): 'jig pa dang / mes 'jig pa dang / rlung gis 'jig par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed bsam gyis myi khyab 'dang pa'i e 'os mnan cing sems can su gnod pa
370a2(mdo): myed par mkhas pag/ stag go// thams kyang chos kyi sprin gyis khol 2/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can rnams la 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'phrul dang bcas ya nga / gnod ya @
370a3(mdo): pa dang / mu ke'i mya ngan chen po byin gyis rlob pa kun tu stond pa la mkhas pa/ sems can gzhan la rnam par 'tshe ba myed pa/ mngon par shes / sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs
370a4(mdo): rgyas 'byung bar kun tu ston da pa ga s+hog ste/ 2'ang skyor la stso/ das pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'argyal thams cad kyang bying bya ldon pag/ stag go// yang de'i tshe yangs la dun gyi kong khyo che
370a5(mdo): yan klob khyer med pa nas rgyas bdag yon mangs can zhes byab dge' bsnyen 'atus yongs su ma no tu/ na tu 'dang dam chos 'ad 'apa dang po ge byed dadamaldan 'dab rgyan
370a6(mdo): pa mgo' mas bya 'a te phyid kyi 'dzubs papa bcom ldan 'das pa sa ni daphyogs gcig tu dun go/ khyim 'dag par gyu pa pa ma da tsha ma mangs su ma pa te bdun dang po
370b1(mdo): ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyi nad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'jug nas thams cad kyang byig myi 'dzums 'ang bcom ldan 'das la lta zhi rje
370b2(mdo): par gyur da to// khyim ba dag legs spyan yang khyim bdag lnga stong ka se yongs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das pa la ba der song ste phyind pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
370b3(mdo): phyogs gcig tu 'jug na gyid kyi 'dzubs par bcom ldan 'das la salta zhig 'dug go// khyim bdag ded dpon pa' po yang g.yog par po dang / bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der song ste phyi nad nas con ldan 'ad
370b4(mdo): byi zhabs ma mgo lams phyas lamadu te/ phyogs gcig tu 'jug nus/ bcom ldan 'das la byin gyi 'dzums pa sa dge dmag go// sam pa'i grong khyim chen po nas kwa snod na kyi rlo
370b5(mdo): bzangs tshong dpon gyi bu brgyad khri bzhi' stong gis yongs su bskord te/ bdun du 'dar nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba der so pa ste phyind pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mge bos byan
370b6(mdo): 'dzal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la myig myi 'dzums par lta zhing 'jug go// bram ze'i khye'u byis bya da yang bram ze'i khye u rgyas yongs su bskord te mdun tu bdar nas bcom ldan 'das
370b7(mdo): lwa ba der song ste phyind nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal ma la mgol bas phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gdag tu 'aluka nas// thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la byig gyi 'dzums bu ste dpa 'khod par byed do// 
370b8(mdo): brel ze rgya mu dgal ba le na la yang g.yog nas pa'i khye'u lnga 'byam dang / bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de song gi phyi ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabasas sahA mi rnaMs kyi chomaman spyod pa ga tu yo
371a1(mdo): ba da 'a kyin kyi lams napa ldan do// sum 'arnam pa'i bu sus ban ka'i rgyam ma lces dgra' yang gron cag ma lnga gro nam ses su ma rjod tu matsun su 'das
371a2(mdo): gdam/ glang po'i dang ma da myongs nod teg bcom ldan 'das gas 'deng po pa na ma de bzhin du drang ba'i ma chim pa pa de rgyam tu pa myong ma no / lham bu na pa maldan sa bzhon pa las 'bras te/ gadzan
371a3(mdo): bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril 'dzegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyi nad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo' bos phyag 'tshal te/ srog chags lnga sto dang lhan cig tu phyogs
371a4(mdo): gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das myin mye 'dzums pard lta zhib 'dug go// grong khyer chen po bar na se nas tshong dpo dan gyi bu yul 'khor bzang po zhes bya ba yang tshong dpon gyi bu ShA
371a5(mdo): nas bcom ldan 'das la byig myi 'dzums par lta zhing 'dug go// lnga'i dbang po brgyar byin dang / phyi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la dang / lha'i bu rab phyug chen po dngan ske'i bu
371a6(mdo): rga ba dang / lba'i bu shin tu rnam yang gnon sem pa dang / 'i bu 'tshams pa 'das dang / lha'i bu gzhan ya' bsam gyis kyi khyab mtshungs pa byed do nas su byed dpag tu byed cing byed ma na
371a7(mdo): de yang g.yog ska'i bu bye ba khrag khrig pa rgyal stong dang / bcom ldan 'das ka la ba deng so ste lpags nas/ lha'i bu re res kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i 'chod pa bsapa gyis mye
371b1(mdo): byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la myig myi 'dzums par lta zhing 'khod par gyur da to// yang de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i khung bu re re dang / dpel byed pa
371b2(mdo): po re re dang / mtshan re re nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'od zer phyung ngo // 'od zer de re res kyang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi
371b3(mdo): rdul snyed 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgyal stong grangs byed pa 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa
371b4(mdo): re re yar rin po che li khang pa ba tsigs pa chen po nang h+ya bye ba dang gu tshad brgyal stong yod pa/ rin po chen kha khyer gyis bskor ba 'i nor bu/ mu tig dang / rin po che'i lnga lngas mdzes par byas pa/

371b6(mdo): song ste phyind nas wa'i me tog ki smen dang / rin po che'i sman dang / na bza'i sprin dang / tsan dan sprul gyi snying po dang / ma ka ru dang / spos kyi sprin dang / lha'i rol po dang / byig rdom pa dang / ku'i bAn 'jig rten

372a2(mdo): phrag pa gcig tu gza nas pus mo g.yas pa'i ska las la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbya ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'ang phod ces she/ ste ma to// gal te zhus nas
372a3(mdo): shu ba lung bstan pa la slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dasngal bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lo bdeg phyogs 'ag zhig zhu'o// de
372a4(mdo): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dadapal bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// bzang skyo khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig/ ras dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan
372a5(mdo): pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bkal stsa lad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' bzang spyod gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas dang nang
372a6(mdo): spyod pa ji lta bu dang / tshul ji lta bu dang / khyad par ji lta bu dang / dgel ba'i pa 'i lta bu dang / brtson 'grus ji lta bu dang / rab tu zhi ba ji lta bu dang / ye shes la mkhas pa ji lta bu dang / dran pa ji lta bu dang / togs

372a8(mdo): ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubasas myi nyams pa legs/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pas byung ba lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes pa la tshon 'grus sbyangs
372b1(mdo): sogs/ ji ltar na shes rab che ba lags/ ji ltar na ye shes chen po la mkhas pa lags/ ji ltar na tshul khrims rnam par dag pa lags/ ji ltar na thos pa'i chos rnams myi bskyed pas dran pa dang ldan

372b4(mdo): rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'angs rnams mthong zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu ma ma ches par de dag gi chos la thams cad kyang kurnyed 'idzin kun

372b8(mdo): dag la lags/ ji sa na chog thams cad ras tur byel ba rnam par nges pa ma kham tham tham ma mnga' lags/ des pan blo gnyid sa mchil pa bzhin 'dul zhis nin du gsus y-is// sa de 'di de/ 
373a1(mdo): rgya chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa lags/ ji ska na 'jig rten gyi khams mthal yas pa dbyangs kyis rko bar bgyid/ ji ltar na 'jig rten gyi// khams mthal yas u maM mchis laya pu'i khum du

373a8(mdo): ba'ang skyong khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems la ni pa'ang skyong khyod legs so// bzang skyong de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// byang chub sems dpa

374a1(mdo): mngon par dga' ba myed pa dang / 'khob pa la nyes dmyigs su lta pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la phan yon du lta ba dang / lhag pa'i bas ma yas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i
374a2(mdo): ga/ 'dod pa dang / g.yo' myed pa dang / gya gyu byed pa dang / sgyu myed pa dang / tshul 'chos pa byed pa dang / lags ga myed pa dang / gzhog slongs byed pa dang / thob kyis 'jal ba myed ga dang / rnyed pa dang / seM tshun na yod
374a3(mdo): su spong ba dang / bcon 'grus 'tshams pa dang / shaM nad tu bzod pa dang / le lo myed pa dang / sgrib pa spong ba dang / dge la pa bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po skyon myed pa dang / ta
374a4(mdo): nge 'dzind kyi phu ba po las myi g.yol ba dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas mya ngoms pa dang / bas
374a5(mdo): gtan dang / rnama'ang pa rang pa dang / ting nge 'dzin na dang / snyoms ra 'jug pa rnamasalas 'grus pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ji gar 'dod la bzhin rkun ma ya chen pa dang / rgya
374a6(mdo): pa'i ye shes la dbang sgyur ba dang / blo tha dad pa myed pa dang / bems po ma yin pa dang / mya 'on myo lkug pa dang / gzhan gyi dring la mya 'jog pa dang / kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po rnam par spong ba dang / 
374a7(mdo): skyes bu dam pa'i gnas pa thob pa dang / skyes bu ran pa la mya lta ba dang / byis pa rnams rnam par spong ba dang / mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa dang / dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa dang / 
374a8(mdo): khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba rnams dang myi 'dre ba dang / dben pa la gnas pa dang / steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
374b1(mdo): rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni bzang skyong rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ste/ ting nge 'dzind 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad la sgrib pa myed pa
374b2(mdo): shes par 'thob bo// bzang spyod gzhan yang rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya la ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / tshig thams cad la
374b3(mdo): mtshams sbyar ba shes pa dang / khyim gyi dngos po yongs su gtong ba dang / khams gsum la mngon par myi dga' ba dang / sems ma zhum pa dang / chos thams cad yang mngon par ma zhen pa dang / dam pa'i chos
374b4(mdo): yongs su 'dzin pa dang / chos sbed pa dang / las kyi rnam par sbyin pa la yid ches pa dang / 'dul ba la mkhas pa dang / dra pa nye bar zhi pa dang / 'thab pa myed pa dang / 'byed pa byed pa
374b5(mdo): bzod ya yang dag par 'dzind pa dang / rtogs pa yang dag par/ 'dzind pa dang / rtogs pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos nyid rab tu dbyel pa la mkhas pa dang / chos gtan la dab ba pa dang / chos
374b6(mdo): kyi tshig la mkhas la dang / chos kyi tshig rab tu dbyel ba shes pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' shes pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba shes pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / 2
374b7(mdo): gsum yongs su dag par shes pa dang / lus kyi gnas shes pa dang / sems kyi gnas shes pa dang / spyod lam srung ba shes pa dang / lam rnam par dag pa dang / sgrub pa las shind du 'dra ba dang / hru po yos
374b8(mdo): su shes pa dang / khams mnyam pa nyid tu shes pa dang / skye mched selang pa dang / sred pa spong ba dang / myi skye ba la bzod pa'i bya ba la 'jug pa dang / rgyu stond pa dang / las dang 'bras du chud myi gson pa dang / 
375a1(mdo): chos mthong ba dang / lam sgom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang phrad pa dang / shes rab rno ba dang / tshig rab tu dbyel ba shes pa dang / sgra yongs su shes pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob
375a2(mdo): ya dang / chos kyi dgal ba rjes su myob ba dang / dpal dang / mnyen pa dang / ngang bde la la dang // khro gnyer byed pa dang / des yadang / 'grogs na 'del ba dang / cig 'jam pa dang / gsod pad+ha swA pa dang / tshur ga yes
375a3(mdo): par 'ongs so zhes smra ba dang / snyom las myed pa dang / bla ma la gus pa dang / bla ma la sI zhu che ba dang / skye ba la myi dag lab dang / chos dkar pos mya ngoms pa dang / 'tshol lo rnam par dag pa dang / dgon ya'i ka
375a4(mdo): myi gtong ba dang / sa rnam par 'jog pa dang / dran pa chud myi gso/ na pa dang / phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang skye mched ya mkhas pa dang / mngon par shes ya mngon gsum du
375a5(mdo): bya ba la 'jug pa dang / nyon mongs 'a sel ba dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa dang / khyad paradu 'gro ba dang / skom pa'i rgyu mthun pa' dang / ltung la skyes 'byin
375a6(mdo): pa la mkhas pa dang / kun nas dkris pa rnam par gnon pa dang / bag la nyal spong ba dang / sred pa las shi nad tu 'dab dang / tshe rabs dran pa dang / las kyi rnam par sbyin pa la le chom phyin pa dang / la so la sems
375a7(mdo): pa dang / skye ba la yid myi rton la dang / las mngon par 'du bya byed pa dang / nang gi skye mched yid sa myi byed pa dang / phyi'i skye mched rnams la kun tu myi phyul dang / bdag la myi stod ya dang / gzhan la mya spong ba da
375a8(mdo): myi dgal ba ya ma zhen pa dang / so so'i skye bo la mye rtond pa dang / tshul khrims kyi mthun pa dang / bsnyen yang dka' ba dang / gzil 'arjid che ba dang / bdag shes pa dang / nyams pa myed pa dang / spyod las phun su
375b1(mdo): tshogs pa la gnas pa dang / gnod sems myed pa dang / tshig myi brlang ba dang / gzhan la myi gnod pa dang / mdza' po rjes su srung ba dang / dzA ya myaM 'che ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa dang / sems can yi gnod pa
375b2(mdo): byed pa dang / tshig 'jam pa dang / khams gsum pa myi gnas pa dang / gsang ba'i tshig rnams sru ba la dang / chos thams cad la stong pa nyid dang bathun par bzod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
375b3(mdo): shind tu 'dun pa dang / ye shes gsal ba dang / tshul khrims brtan pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la 'jug pa dang / gcig pur dka' ba dang / cung zad shes pas chog par myi 'dzind pa dang / sems zhum
375b4(mdo): byed pa dang / lta bar gyur da pa rnam par spong ba dang / gzungs thob pa dang / ye shes thob pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la na/ tan byed pa dang / gtan tshigs dang / rigs bya dang / tshul gyi sgo
375b5(mdo): gyur pa dang / 'dems pa dang / rjes su stond pa dang / spyod pa dang / mthun par bzod pa dang / bzod pa'i sa dang ldan pa dang / myi zod pa myed pa dang ldan pa dang / phyi shes pa spong ba dang / ye shes la
375b6(mdo): gnas pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yus dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid 'o du chud cing rab tu rtogs par shes pa dang / sems des pa sems dgul dang / skye bas nyid
375b7(mdo): mtshams kyi spyor ba dang / nying mtshams kyi sgom 'ang shes pa dang / phung 'ong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / 'dod chags gsol la dang / zhe sdang bral ba dang / gtol mug spa pa'i dang / rnal 'phyo sa na
375b8(mdo): ba dang / myi rigs pa dang bral ba dang / dge' ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la na na tan byed pa dang / mtshan mi nyal ba dang / spong ba myo gtong ba dang / chos dkar po rnamras kun tu srung pa dang / 
376a1(mdo): dgel ba'i rtsa ba sngon tu 'gro la dang / thabs la mkhas pa shes pa dang / mtshan ma spong ba dang / 'du shes las ldog pa dang / mdo' sde mngon par 'asgrub pa dang / 'dul pa la ma[]
376a2(mdo): pa dang / bden lal rnam par nges pa dang / rnam par grol la la mngon gsum du bya la la 'jug pa dang / tshig gcig tu nges pa dang / gtsigs par smra ba dang / ye zhes pa lta la bzhin 'od lta
376a3(mdo): thos pa yongs su tshol ba dang / ye shes kyis kyi ngoms pa dang / sems yongs su dag la dang / lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / dogs pa byed pa'i tshig dang / so pa nyid
376a4(mdo): la kun tu stend pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa la sten pa dang / smod pa byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis myi dmyigs par shes pa dpa/ myi 'jigs pa thos pa dang / sdug bsngal phra rnams
376a5(mdo): myi brnyas pa dang / de dag la nor sbyin pa dang / dbul po rnamasal khyad du mya gsod pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la snying ba ce' ba dang snying rdze ba'i blo dang ldan pa dang / na bA
376a6(mdo): dngos po dang ldan pa dang / chos kyis phan 'dogs pa dang / zang 'di yongs su gtong ba dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la g.yol byed par stend pa dang / 'dog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / lhad rje
376a7(mdo): b.ram pas 'gron du gnyer ba dang / ji skad smras pa bzhin du byed pa dang / phyir zhing 'tshan la dang / ste steng byas pas dga' ba myong dang / dpe 'ashes pa dang sngon byung ba la ma'as pa dang / byi 'dang 'ang
376a8(mdo): btags pas 'jug pa shes pa dang / btanas kun tu 'dzes pa dang / 'ashupa 'i byin la la mngod pa dgal 'byed pa dang / 'aku la rgya byed pas bta snyoms su byed pa dang / rnyed lado su myi ga
376b1(mdo): ba dang / ma rnyed pas srog bar myi 'gyur la dang / grags yal mngon par 'dod pa byed pa/ ma grags pa la khong / cwor byed pa dang / bsngags pa la rjes su chags pa byed pa dang / smad pa la swa dong lA
376b2(mdo): gyi 'gyur ba dang / bdel ba la 'angon par gyi 'chags pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis myi skyo ba dang / 'du byed kun tu myi 'dzin pa dang / yang dag pa'i bsngags pa la myi chags pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i
376b3(mdo): pa dang du len pa dang / spyod yul ma yin pa rnam par spong ba dang / spyod yul la 'jug pa dang / cho ga phun sum tshogs pa dang / ngang tshul ngan pa rnam par spong ba dang / sems can gyi dge' ba'i wa tsha
376b4(mdo): la myi smod pa dang / bstand pa kun tu srung ba dang / sma ba nyung ba dang // mnyen pa dang / skabs kyi tshig la mkhas pa dang / phyir rgol batshar gcod pa dang / dus su 'gro ba dang / spyod lam brtaHsa lam
376b5(mdo): yin pa dang / spyod lam mdzes pa dang / don dang don ma yin pa she sa pa la mkhas pa dang / 'jig rten shes pa dang / bstan pacos shes pa dang / gsal bar smra ba dang / lag rkyong ba dang /

376b7(mdo): rgyub dang / bla ma la ldang ba dang / stan bting ba dang / nga rgyal tshar gcod pa dang / sems yang dag par 'dzind pa dang / don rab tu rtogs par shes pa dang / ye shes bskyed pa dang / mya shes pa dang de la
376b8(mdo): sems la 'jug pa shes pa dang / sems kyingo ba nyid khong du chud cing shes pa dang / bskul pa dang / mye sprul pa bsgral pa la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi skad shes pa dang / 
377a1(mdo): nges pa'i tshig rnama' gan nga / don rnam par nges 'ashes pa dang / don pa yin larnam par spong la dang / bsam gtan rnams sprul la dang / de dag gi yo byal bam gyi khyen pa dang// 
377a2(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta zhing so sor rtog pa dang / sems can kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la rnam par lta ba da
377a3(mdo): las thams cad rnam par 'byed pa dang / las dang rnam par spyod pa byed pas 'jug pa shes pa dang / mos pa snga tshogs la 'jug pa dang / brjed ngas la byed pa dang / khams sna tshogs dang rnam
377a4(mdo): mngon gsul tu kyang da pa dang / ro rje ga zhu'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu mthong la dang / tshangs pa 'i dbyangs kyi ting nge 'dzin rnapa 'am chen pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ma ma 'gyu
377a5(mdo): ba thams cad gcig pa dang / myi byed pa dang / sngon gyi gnas te sa su dran pa shes pa dang / kun tu 'gro ba'i lam shes bskal ba dang / zag pa zad pa dang / spong 'dus gcig skye 'o
377a6(mdo): shes pa dang / lha'i byin thogs pa myed pas lta ba dang / gzugs thams cad kun tu stod pas rnam par chen pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs byed pa mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa shes pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan mo
377a7(mdo): gi tshul gyi gzungs la 'jug pa shes pa dang / skad thams cad brag ca'i skad dang / mtshungs pa nyid du shes pa dang / ci rigs par chos stonod pa dang / sems can thams cad la legs par bshad pas chis

378a5(mdo): pa dang / myi sgrub pa shes pa la rnam par dpyod pa dang / phrugs dang cha dang rjel gzhal 'byed la bstan pa shes pa dang / thabasadang shes rab chen po'i 'od zer rab tu gtong ba shes la dang

378b6(mdo): yang myed pa dang / sems rin po che lta bu dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad sel ba shes pa dang / dge la ba'i apa dang / bsod nams tshad myed pa stsogs pa tusa? gsum cu yongs su bsngol ba mkhas

379a1(mdo): gshegs pa'i ye shes la rnam par lta ba mdon gsum du shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang / sems zhi zhing rab tu zhi la nye bar zhi ba dang / 'dul

379a7(mdo): chub rang 'byung gi ye shes la lta ba mngon gsum du shes pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod lam kun tu stonod pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du phyir myi ldog
379a8(mdo): chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byin gyis rlob pa shes pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smind par bya ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed cing bsam gyis myi khyab la mtshungs pa myed cing gzhal du

379b2(mdo): kyi kha dog dang / spyod lam skal par kun tu stonod pa dang / sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rgyun myi gcod pa dang / 'asam gtan mkha' khyam

379b4(mdo): len pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyal stong dag dang / 'jig rten gyi/ khams rab 'byas thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa than/ sa cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba shes yi nga/ gnas
379b5(mdo): gang nas kyang g.yol ba byed la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskal zhing bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / mchod pa'i las rgyan gyi gcad pa yang shes pa dang / sems can mtha' yas
379b6(mdo): pa yongs su spyarnyed par bya ba'i phyir mthong ba dang / thos pa don yod pa 'dod cing gnas pa dang / sems can yongs su spyad pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin tu gdul ba'i phyir/ sems kyi skad ci// sems kyi
379b7(mdo): skad cig la dgal ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa dang / 'chi 'ab ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa kun tu gnod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / btud lung yang yum tu na/ 
379b8(mdo): ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu stond pa nas/ ji tsam du dam pa'i chos gnas pa dang no nub pa'i
380a1(mdo): phyogs bcul thams cad kyi nus tharabs kyi tshul snyed dag kun da cu gan ma yang zhem sa / na tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang kyi rgyab ste/ bamang stso 'di ni ngom dun 'a ma la bas/ 
380a2(mdo): pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzind ces bya'o// / bam po gnyis pa// / bzang spyod ting nge 'dzin 'di yongs su spyod la byas pa ka zhen/ 
380a3(mdo): chos gang yang kun tu myi 'dzin pa gyi 'do ba kyi 'jon pa/ 'du byed thams cad rab tu zhi pa/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'ju pa rjes/ 
380a4(mdo): thams cadas kyi rton pa/ rnam par bya rtog pa dang / rnam par/ smras pa/ kun nas kyi slong gyi skyed pa/ rtog pa dang / rnam dpar rtog pa dang / kund tu rtog pa yang bdag par gcod pa/ sems
380a5(mdo): kyi dmyishes pa yid la myi byed pa/ rnam par shes pa yang dgajigacod pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gtil suH/ yang dag par gcod pa/ mtha' dang mnyal byed pa pa myi bye
380a6(mdo): yid la byed pa yang dag par gcod pa// phum po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi rang bzhin shes pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / mos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / spyod pa dang / cho ga dang / spyod tshus
380a7(mdo): nan tan byed cing gnas pa/ nyon mongs pa myed pa'i sa dang ldan pa/ zhi ba'i sa dang ldan pa spros pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad dang / de bzhin gzhig so ng+ge
380a8(mdo): spyod lam thams cad dang / yon tan thams cad yongs su 'thun pa 'don ba'ang skyong ting nge 'dzind 'da' yongs su sbyang ba bya'o// bzang spyod byang chub sems dpal ni chos la sems shing chos spyod pa yin
380b1(mdo): des na da bzhin gnas sa kyi sum sapayang dag par rjes su kyis thang na/ gzhan bya/ 'angs byangam chub sems la de pa yo / 
380b2(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyi tshig 'di ji lta bu'i ji gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa yin nam/ 'on te gzugs las gzhan zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yin snyam gyi di ltar dpyad pa

380b4(mdo): spyod pa myed pa/ rtsa dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / bong pa dang / mya gar lta bu ngan pa/ dbu' ba rdos pa lta bu yin zhing / 'byung ba/ chen po bzhi'i phan tshun nas bsdus pa ni gzugs shos bya'o// 
380b5(mdo): kazugs ni te nad cing 'dre yad par 'byung ba'o// gang rten rtsi 'bres par 'byung ba de ni myi rtag pa'o// kang myi rtag/ pa de ni sdug bsngal ba'o// gang sdug bsngal ba de bdag myed pa'o// 
380b6(mdo): bdag myed pa de rang bzhin myed pa'o// gang rang bzhin myed pa de snang ba myed pa'o// gang sna ba myed pa de yang dag pa ma yin pa'o// gang yang dag pa ma yin pa de brdzun pa slu ba'i chos so// gang brdzun po u ba'i chos
380b7(mdo): de myi bden pa'o// gang myi bden pa de de bzhin nyid ma yin pa'o// gang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bden pa yang dag pa de bzhin nyid/ ma nor bya de bzhin
380b8(mdo): nyid/ gzhan ma yin la de bzhin nyid/ sa sog pa dang / bden pa gal/ ya dag par smral/ ye gas kyim sonam can/ ye shes mapa ma yas pa dang ldan pa/ sems cad bakhyen / rnams ma gcig
381a1(mdo): gos 'phrul das 'ayu kyi 'jigs su bzhes das pa'i samod du su phyin la song pa myi tog nas par gyi tog rgyanam nas ga' 'a dang gatshungs pa byas kyi chos thams
381a2(mdo): ba/ kyis myi 'grangs pa/ ma byas pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ 'jug pa myed pa/ mtha' yas pa/ gnas myed pa/ rnam par myi rig pa/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa thun tu skyab myed pa/ shin tu ngag
381a3(mdo): nyon mongs pa myed pa/ ma byung ba/ spyod pa byed pa/ gnas byed pa'o snyam mo// de 'di ltar so sor tog ste/ gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin// gzugs las gzhan pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/

381b8(mdo): shes de bzhin gshegs pa 5/ 'odan te 'du shes pas gzhan bzhin gas rnam so// 'dris rim sor rtog ste// 'jugs de bzhin gshenas pa ma yin// 'dugs pas rgan yin do/ 
382a1(mdo): zhe na/ mun pa sa kyi rgyas bu gyi dang / gzugs dang / 'apa' dang / ngas byed pa lus pas sa nges par byung mam/ mnan gshen sa yin 'jun can te/ sem

383b1(mdo): 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ rnam par shes pa de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan pa yang ma yin no// gal te rnam par shes pa las gzhan pa zhig de bzhin gshegs par gyi redan

385a7(mdo): ni bems po'o// g.yol ba myed pa sems dpa' myed pa/ Tha dang tshig pa myed pa/ shing dang myig yor lta bu ste/ de ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu/ ran pa reg pa sa
385a8(mdo): pa las byung ba ste/ de yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// 'du shes ni spyig phywa lta bu myag dang / gzugs dang / snang ba dang yid la byed pa 'dus pa las byung ba ste/ de yang byang chub mngon ta
385b1(mdo): rdzogs pa pa 'thar bya rgya'o// 'du byed rnams ni dngos po myed la/ btsun pa slu ba'i chos can ma rig pa 'dus pa las byung ba ste/ de dag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs papa mtshad kyi rgya'o// dam par zhes pa da
385b2(mdo): ma lha nu/ gsol/ gsog/ yang dag la ma yin pa/ 'du byed 'dus pa las nges par skyes pa tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa 'dus pa las byung ba ste/ de yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa pa 'tshang myi
385b3(mdo): snyam mo// bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste// gal te phung po lnga byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgyan/ mtshan gyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ ci chos
385b4(mdo): rgyas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang bya'am/ 'on te dgel bzhi mapas sam/ de ji lta bu zhig sum mo de 'ang lter so sod rtog ste/ mtshan gyis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
385b5(mdo): rgya'o/ gal te mtshan gyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'a ngargya bar gyur dan ni 'khor los sbyang ba'i rgyal ba yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
385b6(mdo): ma byab sa khyed ma tshan yul bstsal pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i bya ba gas so// de 'di skang pos brtag ste/ gam sa mtshan gyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tsha kyi byad / gro ba kyis mngon
385b7(mdo): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am snyam mo// de 'di snyam du sems te/ chos kyis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos ni gzugs myed pa/ bstan du byed pa/ thogs pa myed
385b8(mdo): nas la / khyod pa/ gnas kya / rang kyi / pas da sa byed / gyis sa
386a1(mdo): mya rgya'o snyam mo// de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ gal te/ chos kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgyan/ dgel ba'i khabs byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshar rgya 'am de ji lta bu zhi
386a2(mdo): snyam mo// de 'di sa mang du sems te/ dgel ba sos pas kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang kyi rgya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpal dgel ba'i rnamakhas pasres nas byang chub rgya no su myi dun
386a3(mdo): la sangs rgyas nyid bzung nas kyang mya ldang ste/ de rgya gzhan dpa gzhan la so sor brtags na ma dmyigs pa dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de su zhig snyam mo// des de ltar so sor brtags
386a4(mdo): na dgel ba'i ab yang ma dmyigs nas/ ci dge' ba'i tsha ba rnams gzugs kyis bsags pa zhig gam/ 'on te tshor ba dang / 2du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pas sam/ kla zugs na
386a5(mdo): bems po/ g.yo ba myed la/ sems myed pa ste/ des kyang dge' ba'i a pa ma bsags/ tshor ba ni chu bur lta bu/ ngan pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba reg pa 'dus paM las byung ba ste/ des kyang
386a6(mdo): dgel ba yi chab ma pa phags/ 'du shes ni smyig rgya la bu/ myig dang / gzugs dang / snang ba dang / yid la byed la 'dus pa las byung la ste/ des kyang dgel ba'i mapa mi bsags/ 'du byed ni dngos pa sbyin
386a7(mdo): brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can/ ma rig pa 'dus pa pas byung ba ste/ de dag gis kyang dge' ba'i ma ma bsags/ rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu/ ke so pa/ gsog/ yang dag pa ma yin pa/ 'du byed 'dus pa ltas
386a8(mdo): nges pa skyes pa/ tshul bzhin ma pa ni yid la byed pa 'dus pa las byu ba // des kyang dge la 'a'i mam lasags so gas nas/ des das pa brtanas pa dang / gang gis dge' 'a'i sal kyi thomags pa de kyi
386b1(mdo): dmyigs so// des de ltar brtags na myi dmyigs te/ myi dmyigs so snyam pa'i rlom sems kyang myed do// gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug pa de yang myi dmyigs te/ myi dmyigs so snyam pa'i rlom sems
386b2(mdo): kyang myed do// des byang chub kyang myi dmyigs te/ myi dmyigs so snyam pa'i rlom sems kyang myed do// 'di la su zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de yang myi dmyigs te/ myi dmyigs so snyam pa'i rlom soms
386b3(mdo): kyang byed do// des de ltar so sor brtags nas byang chub kyi rlom sems kyang myed/ sems can gyi rlom sems kyang myed/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rlom sems kyang myed pa de/ bzang spyod ldan myed pa yang dag lnga
386b4(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ de chos kang la yang rlom sems byed de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de chos gang la yang skye ba yang myi 'thor+ya/ 2gag pa yang myi mthong ste/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu zhi ba'i gnas
386b5(mdo): khab tu chud pas de'i phyim sangs rgyas shes bya'o// de ni rtog rnam par rtog pa dang / kun tu rtog pa thams cad la gyi 'dun sA de ni zhi ba'o// thams par gyu da pa'o// sems dang yid dang / 
386b6(mdo): par shes pa dang bral ba ni sangs rgyas shes bya ste/ bzang skyod 'di ni rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// bzang skyod ting nge 'dzin 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ting
386b7(mdo): 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'byung ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ma
386b8(mdo): 'gags kyang / skye zhing 'gag par kun tu gda' bo dang / yi ge gcig kyang kyi brjod la/ 'khor bye ba gdas ma mchis pa la chos stond par yang kund tu gda' ba'i mangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs me She sa yin mtshan
387a1(mdo): to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jas dmas gzhon nu 'gyur na pa sa 'di skad ces bkal su ya to// 'ang sa dpal gang yon tan gyi napan tho bcul gnyis kyis mngon 'gyu' phags
387a2(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhi tu dran myong pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la bskal do'i snyigs ma la yang kun tu stond pa dang / dus snyigs ma dang / sems can snyigs
387a3(mdo): nyon mongs pa snyigs ma dang / tshe snyigs ma dang / theg pa tha dad ya dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar ston pa dang / chos stond pa sna tshogs dang / sems can yongs su sbyind par
387a4(mdo): byed pa sna tshogs dang / gzhan mu stegs can gyis dkrug pa'i ku na nas nyan nas nyon mongs pa dang / bdud dang btud kyi nye ba la nyon mongs pa dang / bcud kyi las dang / pha rol gyi dmas tshogs kyis
387a5(mdo): gtsel ba'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / yul 'khrug pa dang / khwad khrug dang / chom po'i nye za'i nyon mongs pa dang / kla klos dkrun pa dang / rkun pos dkrug pa dang / su kes dkrug pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
387a6(mdo): srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha ba dang / grul bum dang / lus srul po'i 'jug pa yang kun tu ston da cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyes pa de dag kyang myed la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi dgel ba'i rtsa ba dang / spyod
387a7(mdo): dang / smon lam dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dul ba ji lta bzhin tu/ sems can yongs su smyind par byed pas sems can rnams kyis bya ba de dag shes kyang / de bzhin ga sheg 'on
387a8(mdo): thams cad tu btang snyoms pa ste/ rnam par myi rtog pa 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas par blta'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'das dpal gzhon nur gyur dums 'o
387b1(mdo): skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yon tan gyi snying po gang dag dang ldan pa dang / yon tan gang dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
387b2(mdo): yon tan gyi snying po bcu'i gnyis po de bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni bskald pa'i snying po dang ldan pa ya ne/ dus kyi 'di
387b3(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu s+ya dang / gcer bu pa rnams kyi rgyu ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bsam pa dang ldan pa'i bas ma brA y-i ne/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni
387b4(mdo): canan kyis 'am ma'i sa dang ngan ma mams can rnams ga yin/ byen 'di 'phags pan rgyam mchim dang ldan pa yid/ sangs rgyas byini dang rbad kyad bzhin zhe
387b5(mdo): rnams gshegs shing rjes su gshegs pang yin te/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni yon tan gyi snying po bcur gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa yin no// der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na myen pa yang dag
387b6(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// 'jas dpal khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang nga'i sangs rgyas kyi ni pan/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa lnga dang yanam par gan ga du byed par ga
387b7(mdo): bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gal te de bzhin gshegs pa sems can kha cig la ni theg pa chen po ston da/ kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / sems
388a1(mdo): kha ci la ni nyan thos kyi 'ag pa yon da tam/ des gyung dan de bzhin gshenas pa sems yongs yum dag par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnams lar 'gyur/ mngon par chags par 'gyu chad du bzhin
388a2(mdo): gshegs pa'i nyi tshe ba'i snying rje dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs kyi 'du shes kyi skyon du ltung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa slob dpon chos kyi dpe' 'khrud byed par 'gyur ro// 'jim 'ab
388a3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa chos gang ci stond kyang rung / chos de thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la gzhol ba theg pa chen po la 'bab pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes sgrub pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par
388a4(mdo): byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir 'du ga pa ste/ 'jam dpal de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na theg/ pa ya dad pa rnam par gzhag pa myed do// 'dam dpal gyis gsalang
388a5(mdo): ba/ bcom ldan 'das gas te theg pa pa dad pa rnam la gzhan ma mchis na/ 'don nyan thos kyi mig pa'o// 'di ni rab sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/ 'ad na theg pa chen po'o zhes bcom ldan 'das
388a6(mdo): kyis sems can rnams la theg pa gsum bstand pa de ji lta 'u lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal na / 'jam dpal theg pa ka dang pa zhes bya ba de ni/ sa rnam par gzhag pa'i tshig bla dgas ldan
388a7(mdo): 'jam dag sa ras 'dreng pa ya chos bstand pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag par bstand to// don de bzhin gshegs pas ga bya dadam par gan na nan dang / 
388a8(mdo): chas rgya rtsub pa gas can mams can rnams dang / bsad nas sa rgya tshogs cad byed pa ma lag sa ma ma sems can rnams yongs su phyin pa bya bani phyir sheg pa da ba dan de kyi
388b1(mdo): byed myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings dbyer byed pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal theg pa bstand pa zhes bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas sgrib pa myed par gsungs so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste pa
388b2(mdo): na 'phong gi slob dpon mkhas pa 'phrod shes pa'i mchog gi pha rold tu phyind pa/ thabs dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs dang / 'bade ba dang / spyod lam sna tshogs stond cing slob ma 'pho ba slob kyang 'pho shes pa de
388b3(mdo): gcig yin pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'phor gi slob dpon mkhas pa yang chos kyi tshul sna tshogs la 'jug pas mkhas pa dang / bsam pa dang / mos pa tha dad par sem
388b4(mdo): rnams la zla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gcig da las theg pa gsum tu ston to// 'das dpal 'di lta sted/ dar na/ me stag chu ngu ya pa ya / pA 'iri rgyud dang ldan zhing mchen
388b5(mdo): sreg pa'i bskal ba'i me lta bung tshig par nus par 'gyur ro// ya ma dpal de bzhin tu phyir myi ldog pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba nime stag gcig po de yang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa phyi
388b6(mdo): mtha rad kyis mched cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye zhes chen po'i sngang ba'i bam du byed num par 'gyur ro// 'jas dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ ri dgas phra mo thams cad bdags kyi rgya seng ge mal pa can gyi
388b7(mdo): mdun na 'jug par nus pa myed do// 'jas dpal de bzhin du gzhan su stegs can spyod pa ya dang / kun tu rgya dang / gcer bu pa dang / 'tsho ba can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun na 'dug pa 'am/ tshig g+ha
388b8(mdo): nus pa myed de/ stobs bcul stobs dang / gyi 'jigs pa bzhis 'jigs papa myed pa'i skyes zhu chen po seng ge'i mdun na/ swa sgrog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas byed de/ sems can yongs su sbyin par ba'i
389a1(mdo): phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa ni ma gtogs so// 'dzem dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shard pa 'od zer gyi dra ba brgyal stong grangs rkyed pa rab tu
389a2(mdo): 'byed pa sa/ srin bu me khyer thams cad 'od myed cing lam me ma yin/ ska de ma yin te mdzes lam yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i blan byed pa'i ye shes chen po'i nyi ma'i
389a3(mdo): dkyil 'khor shar nas/ ye shes chen po'i 'od zer brgyal stong grangs byed pa rab tu bkyel bas/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgya dang / gcer bu pa la stsogs pa thams cad 'od myed par 'gyur
389a4(mdo): to// lam me ma yin/ lhang de ma yin zhing mdzes pa ma yin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs su shes par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i yul de na bsam
389a5(mdo): byas myi khyab ste/ des na sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu rnams ku na tu snang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhan du stegs can gyi sgo de dag
389a6(mdo): thams cad ni rnam par b.rad pa dang / ting de 'dzin bsam byis myi khyal ya la gnas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las nges par byung ba/ thabs mkhas pa chen pos rnam par chen / sangs
389a7(mdo): dang / chos dngape / dge 'dun yod la byed pa dang pa bral la/ sems can yongs su smyin da par byed pa'i mchog gi pha ro yad tu phyind pa ste/ sems can yongs su spyond par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gsheg
389a8(mdo): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyi 'arlabs pa dag go// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems cad re re nas/ 'dzab zhu
389b1(mdo): kla la dbang ba'i rgyal por gyur da te/ de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'di skad ces/ bdag cag gis gar theg pa chen po li nad pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de'i sha yas/ 
389b2(mdo): nyi ma re re zhing yang srang lnga lnga sen mos bcad par bya ste/ de tshul de lta bus srog dang bral yo zhes smra ba5/ 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' de skad smra bas myi skrag/ myo dadang / dang pa
389b3(mdo): myi 'gyur te na tha na swAg pa'i sems gcig kyang myi skyed/ shul ba myed/ kong la myed the tsom myed la phyir zhing chos yongs su bzung la la bzhon te/ klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa la 'thon par 'gyur
389b4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'jam dpal sems dpa' ba/ sbyin pa la dpa' ba/ tshul khrims la dpa' la/ be 'od pa ladapa' ba/ brtson 'grus pa dpa' la/ bsam gtan la dpa'
389b5(mdo): shes rab la dpa' ba/ ting nge 'dzin la dpa' ba zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' de gsod pa'i kyi de dag la mye khro ba dang / za ba dang / zhe sdang gi se shes
389b6(mdo): skyed na/ 'jas dpal byang chub sems dpa' de ni tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa/ dbang po dang mtshungs pa/ lhun po dang mtshungs pa/ myigayo'i la/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ byams pa dang ldan pa/ sems can badz+ra
389b7(mdo): cad kyi bsas gso' ba la gnas pa/ phyir myi ldog pa'i spyod yul ba/ sems sa dang mtshungs pa/ sems me dang mtshungs pa/ sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ste/ sems cad thams ca
389b8(mdo): kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / ka ti'i muka dang / tha ba sel ba'i phyir zhugs pa'o// 'jam dpal gang gise gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams las re re la yang gang ka'i klung ki bye
390a1(mdo): byed kyi sangs rgyas kyi ni ma nom bu rin po ma dab gi rgyas thos rab tu bkang ste dbul ba phul ba/ de ltar 'phrul bas gang ka'i klu na byab srid kyi bums pa mang kya su
390a2(mdo): rabs/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang gis rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas phyogs gcig tu song ste/ 'di ltar sems kyis mngon dang rtog cing 'di lta bu'i chos
390a3(mdo): bslab par bya'o zhes slob par 'dod na des ma bslabs su zin kyang bsod nams ches mang du bskyed de/ byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po sbyin pa'i bsod nams na de ste bu ma
390a4(mdo): no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i sems bsnyed ma thag pa des/ chos bzhi la yongs su 'dzind pa'i phyir te/ bzhi'i gang zhe na/ byams pa yongs su bzung la yin/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs
390a5(mdo): dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam sa kyi bka' dang myi 'gal bar byas pa yin te nan tan snying phong byed pa yin/ myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
390a6(mdo): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin te/ chos bzhi'i po de dag yongs su 'dzind to// gzhan yang chos bzhi'i yongs su 'dzind te/ bzhi'i gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
390a7(mdo): dang / skye 'jigs pa bzhi' dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i dang / sgrib pa myed pa'i rgol rnam par thar da pa yongs su 'dzind pa ste/ bzhil po de dag go/ 'jam dpal chos bzhi la dang ldanan
390a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ste/ bzhi la gang zhe na/ dus su sbyin pa dang / g.yol byed cing spu myed pa dang / lhag pa'i bam pa khas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang mya 'bral pa dang
390b1(mdo): sems dang po 'askyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la yang shind tu yang gus pa ste// chos bzhi' bo de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal gal te byad
390b2(mdo): sems dpa' la rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po gang zhig 'di skad ces/ gal te sems can gcig gi don tu dge' ba'i pha ba gcig yang dag par sgrub ste/ tha na cud 'gro'i skye gnas su song sa la na
390b3(mdo): gcig tsam sbyin zhing grub na yang de'i phyir ngas khyod kyi sha sen mos btogs te myed par bya'o zhes ze la/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' de skad zer ba 5/ myi skrag mye dang / dngang bar myi 'gyur zhing 'jigs
390b4(mdo): ba myed kyi 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lus kyi sha sen mos bcad de bor yang bdag spro bar bya'i// bdag sems can gcig gi phyir yang ji tsam du chung yang dge/ 
390b5(mdo): ba'i rtsa ba gcig yang dag par gyi sprug tu gyi gtong ngo snyam na/ sems bskyed gcig po des byang chub sems dpa' des rgyags bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi brta
390b6(mdo): ba myed pa'i mchod sbyin zil gyis gnod to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge' ba'i sngal dpas
390b7(mdo): po khyis gnon te/ ldan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yas byi gyi ldog par 'gyur ro// gapaga' klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'amathasas sbyang ba'i rgyal pa'i myor bar 'gyung ngo // de bzhin gyi grang na
390b8(mdo): bye ma nyid kyi 'argyal byin dang tshangs pa'i tho ba kyi myor par 'gyur ro// datsa phyi zhe na/ 'das dpa' byang chub sems dpal gang gis sems can rnams su snyi rje bskyed na/ de snyi rje dang ldan pa
391a1(mdo): pa'i ya ba des kyang chos bzhi la yongs su 'dzin te/ bzhi lag pa zhen/ brtan pa'i sems yongs su 'dzin da la dang / khong khro ba byed pa'i sems dang / snying rje chen po// yongs su
391a2(mdo): 'dzind pa dang nga phyin da ci log gi shes pa spangs nas/ phyi nad cem log pa'i ye shes dab tu thob pa'o// gzhan yang chos bzhi'i yongs su 'dzin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims phun
391a3(mdo): sum tshogs ya mchog yongs su 'dzind te/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa mchog de dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lha gzhan la rton par myi 'gyur ba dang / dran pa phun sum tshogs pa
391a4(mdo): mchog shos ste// drin la phun sum tshags la mchog de daden mas byang chub sems dpa' sde skye ba ran/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / dgel ba yes shes gnyen phun sum
391a5(mdo): tshogs po mchog yongs su 'dzind te/ dge' ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa mchog de dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'bral bar
391a6(mdo): 'gyur/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mya 'bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tu skye bar 'gyur/ gal te sangs rgyas ni ma byung la 'dzam bu'i gling du skyes na yang skyes bu dam par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i
391a7(mdo): glang na sbyin pa'i gnas gcig pur 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas dang / gzhan mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba de dag mgu' bar byed par 'gyur/ dedan
391a8(mdo): maku' bar byas nas bsod nams dbul bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/ nam bag myed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe yang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams
391b1(mdo): kyis khrul par 'gyu / 'phrul 'das kya bran byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chum la brtson 'bras rtsol par 'gyur/ de'i'adre 'chung kyi 'bar 'gyur/ byang chub yang dag par 'gyu
391b2(mdo): dag pa yongs su 'dzinan pa dang / lus rnam par dag pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa 'tho'i par 'gyur la rnam par dag pa dang / dgel ba'i ab sbyangs pa rnam par dag ya pa/ sangs rgya
391b3(mdo): garten/ chos la rten/ dge' 'dun pa rten/ byang chub sa/ dmas dpa' la ten/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa thams cad la rten de pa yongs su 'dzind pa yin te/ 'jam dpa' rnam
391b4(mdo): par dag par byed pa'i chos de dag yongs su 'dzind par 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ga ya las 'dzam bu kling ba'i sems can gyi srog bcad de
391b5(mdo): de dag gi 'dog pa thams cad thogs pa las/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo kang gzhan zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' dge' ba'i khab gcig sems bskyed pa za na dud 'gro
391b6(mdo): skye gnam su song ba la ya nacig byin pa dang ldan pa'i dgel la la ba'i bar chad byas na/ dadams ma ldog pa grangs myed par bskyed do// de tsa'i phyi bzhin/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba skyed pa'i dge
391b7(mdo): ba'i pa'i bar chad byed par gnas pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la mdo' sde dkon mchog sangs rgyas kyi ye shes skyed pa rnam pa 'di / u 'das mos
392a1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' la smod cing bsngags pa ma yin pa 'dzad/ 'dum par myi 'jod/ dgel ba'i las dang 'bral bar byed pa/ dgel ba'i mal la mos pa dang / 'bra gab byed
392a2(mdo): ba/ cing bar chad byed na/ de dge' ba'i mas bsags pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de der skyes nas lus dpag tshan brgyal ba 'grub bo// lus de po yang 'gol
392a3(mdo): lnga brgyar 'gyur ro/ 'go re re la yang we lnga brgyal lnga brgyar 'gyur ro// lce re re la yang thong shol lnga brgyas rmo bar 'gyur te/ bskal da pa ji snyed cig gis byang chub sems dpa'i de
392a4(mdo): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de snyed kyi bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skyes nas/ sUg bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na
392a5(mdo): rgyas 'byung ba'i bar chad bya bar zhugs pa'i phyir ro// gang sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i bar chad bya ba'i phyir zhugs de sangs rgyas kyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa 'o/ 
392a6(mdo): kyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o// dgel 'dun gyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o// de lha'i rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o// de tshangs pa thams cad kyi rigs ga
392a7(mdo): pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o// de mya'i 'jig rten gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o// de sems can thams cad kyi bde' bar sbyar sa thams cad gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o'ajas
392a8(mdo): gang la la byang chub sems dpa'i dge' ba'i che ba gcod pa'i phyir 'jug pa del/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal chen po skye 'ang 'gyur ro// de tsa'i na na khye
392b1(mdo): sems dpa' de dag bams nadakyil ba'i 'i chon pa thams cadabyang chu mngon par rdzogs papa 'tsha rgya'o// mngon dz+ra
392b2(mdo): sangs rgyas nasasems can rnams la chos kyi 'kho lo rab tu chos thos nas kyang rgyarab tu zhugs par 'gyu

392b4(mdo): bzhir 'gyur su mo bcul gsum dang / 'ja bras dang / dka' ldan dang / 'phrul dka'
392b5(mdo): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi sa 'gyurarna ba dang / nyes pa 'gyur/ rgyas ma dang/ tshogs
392b6(mdo): tshogs kyi bdag potshogs kyi bdan po chen par 'grag po dang / dran mtshan po dang / kan sa ldan por 'a

392b8(mdo): 'od chung dang / da byed 'od dang 'od gsapa dang / dge' chung dang / tshad myed dge' dang / dge' byas pa
393a1(mdo): na byabad pas byam dang / 'das phyi ma da phyi gsung ba dang / nos

393a7(mdo): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpal gangal ma gzhan gyi khyim rnams su byang chub sems dpa' la phra dog dang / ser sna byed
393b1(mdo): des de'i tshe ka ni 'di las 'dzin ma pa chen po/ gsum shes par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i 'jigs pa dang / 
393b2(mdo): yus long gi 'jigs pa dang / yul mtha' khob tu skye ba'i 'jigs pa ste 'jigs pa gsum mo// 'jab dpal kal te/ byang chub
393b3(mdo): sems dpas bsod snyoms blangs te/ rid pa dang / 'phongs pa dang / sprang po dang / slong ba rnams la bgos te byin na/ de dka' ba'i rtsa ba
393b4(mdo): des tshe rjes nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i la po rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gal te/ byang chub sems dpa'
393b5(mdo): khyim pas chos ston cingaTI rje 'am/ don du 'dod/ phan par 'dod/ sems can de dag la bdel ba dang / 'grub par 'dod kyi
393b6(mdo): rnyed pa dang / bkur gyi don du gyi gnye na/ de dgal ba'i la la des shes rab no 'ar 'gyura'akhor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrug med lo dang ldan par 'gyu
393b7(mdo): brgya la'abyin rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshangs pa rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ mye'i dam pa sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// 
393b8(mdo): 'jab dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal ba'i sems can mthong na/ snying rje bskyed cing ba de'i 'a'i
394a1(mdo): sems can mthong na nachog tu dka' ba skyed na/ de tshe rjes nas
394a2(mdo): dge' ba'i rtsa ba desas gser gyi mdog can du 'gyur ro// 
394a3(mdo): sa du rgyaca ka ka' mas@// chos su sa / mngan pa gnyis kyi #
